column1: When a filmmaker’s wildest ideas materialize, an amazing video comes to life. Armed with photo gear that gives us magical powers, we the content creators, always strive to seize the moment.
But a fully geared-up trip on a productive and high-quality film-making adventure requires so much equipment - a tripod, a monopod, a slider, a jib arm, a drone, a camera controller, and more.
Wouldn’t it be so much easier if we could have all the functions we need combined into one device?

That’s why we created the MOZA Slypod Pro for all filmmakers, content creators, and videography lovers! The trusty monopod redefined into the 3-in-1 Slypod Pro. A monopod that combines an electric slider and jib arm empowering content creators to ""Capture the World's Wonders"". We know that you will enjoy the Slypod Pro as much as you enjoy film making. Check out our Slypod Pro Story Below:

This compact and lightweight monopod achieves impossible angle shots, and puts ideas within reach so that filmmakers can go beyond the impossible to realize their full creativity with professional shots outdoors, while traveling lightly, and also saving space in their studios.
We loaned pre-production samples of the Slypod Pro to some of our favorite content creators on YouTube. Here's what they had to say:
The Slypod Pro can extend out to 530mm for a total length of 1380mm. Capture the world's wonders anywhere you go with a portable motorized slider that can be used as a slider or a jib.

The MOZA Slypod Pro is the world’s first electronic height adjustable monopod which can be fully extended and controlled with just one hand. To achieve this, a motor was installed inside the main body which enables it to be controlled more conveniently compared to traditional monopods. Save time, avoid complicated setups, and never miss a shot with Slypod Pro.
Tell your story with perfectly smooth motion shots. Using the ultra-portable and powerful Slypod Pro, to create cinematic shots and sublime video.
The Slypod Pro is your smart electronic camera assistant. It acts as both a motorized slider and an extendable jib arm to capture memorable time-lapse photography from any desired angle.

As a cutting-edge camera partner, Slypod Pro was designed to take care of all settings, which eliminates time-consuming and complicated setup. It allows content creators to only focus on creativity, quickly get into the zone, capture shots from impossible angles fast and easy, and never miss an important shot.

With the support from Slypod Pro, it is possible to conduct an up-close exploration of the world using a macro lens and film objects like insects, plants, and food from unique angles and perspectives. The motorized slider enables content creators to move cameras forward and backward steadily and smoothly while the speed can be adjusted in a particular range via the MOZA Master App. Imagine the powerful visual impact and masterful video this technique can bring to your content.
With lightweight and ultimate portability, the Jib Arm function of Slypod Pro can be utilized to create spinning shots, which can present the beauty of nature and landscapes in an imaginative way.

Slypod Pro allows videographers to film from a high angle to the ground just like having a 'God-like perspective' of the world around us. From this perspective, you are given the omniscient power to see through everything from a wider angle and capture every small detail. Similarly, its Jib Arm function can simulate drone views, shooting from a high angle to a lower angle. Create fabulous scenes without expensive drones or when drones are prohibited at some scenic sites.

Time-lapse photography, integrating a series of still photos captured over a period of time into a film, is one of the most exciting and impressive cinematography techniques. With Slypod Pro you can do this!

Place Slypod Pro horizontally above a tripod, the extension part of it can slide out to take shots from multiple angles smoothly and steadily. During the capture, the speed and length can be precisely controlled by our smart but user-friendly MOZA MASTER APP.

 
  • Star Trail Time-lapse

Using its slider function, Slypod Pro is able to create the famous Dolly Shot, one of the most fantastic filming techniques, which allows the scenes to be seen in a wider angle with more background but also draws the attention of the audience, emphasizing important objects. Add these eye-catching scenes to your content to elevate your films.
•  More Creative Ideas To Be Unveiled

Compared to the last two generations, Slypod Pro has greatly improved on its noise level which is only around 5 decibels during operation. The Slypod Pro is the best creator tool for wedding and interview filming.

column9: s=70a45ef2f3b515f32372aa7a11aab4f2"" src=""""/>

column1: MOZA Master APP allows Slypod Pro to be linked with a MOZA gimbal, enabling 4-axis motion control for professional-level creative possibilities.
Use the MOZA Master App and a smartphone to perform precise movements at variable speeds, program movements, and more.

Experience the Ultra-high power drive motor technology that powers the Mars rover at your fingertips, with an unmatched precision movement of 1mm and acceleration from 0 to 10,000rpm in only 10 microseconds (1/100000s).

The stiff carbon fiber body of Slypod Pro is ultra-lightweight and strong. The internally geared motor provides steady and smooth camera movement. The Slypod Pro is capable of supporting anything from a smartphone to large cameras, and most stabilizers.
The intelligent mechanical design provides Slypod Pro with maintenance-free performance, protecting the built-in transmission system from wind, sand, and dust.
Slypod Pro is compatible with all types of mirrorless or DSLR cameras, tripods, and a wide range of gimbals on the market.

The super built-in battery provides the Slypod Pro with up to 4 hours of run-time. It can also be charged by an external power supply for continuous shooting. With the enhanced power supply, creativity always shines.

The intelligent modular design of Slypod Pro allows universal compatibility with most camera accessories and motion control systems for your indoor and outdoor filming setups. The quick and easy setup allows you to get in action in just a few seconds.
More Creative Videos Made By The Most Creative YouTubers With The Best Creative Tool: MOZA Slypod Pro

column1: • Feedbacks From Our MOZA Slypod, and MOZA Slypod E Customers

Reviews Of The Slypod E From Our Enthusiastic Reviewers
MOZA is an innovative imaging solutions provider, specializing in creating high-tech camera stabilizers &
column2: accessories that provide effective stabilization solutions for creatives in the film and video industry. Our vision “Invented for Video” pushes us to build innovative &amp
column3: high-quality products, as well as provide exceptional customer service.

Reviews Of The Slypod E From Our Enthusiastic Reviewers

MOZA is an innovative imaging solutions provider, specializing in creating high-tech camera stabilizers & accessories that provide effective stabilization solutions for creatives in the film and video industry. Our vision “Invented for Video” pushes us to build innovative & high-quality products, as well as provide exceptional customer service.",69.0,15,"1 Campaign

My name is Marshall White and I am asking for your help. I have been taking pictures for over 20 years and professionally for 7. This campaign is important to me as I try and transition into a full time career as a photographer. Pictures can change the world, and I hope to capture the moments when the world changes. With your help, we can make that dream a reality.

To accomplish these goals I am trying to raise 2500 dollars I will use to purchase a full frame camera that is a Jack of All Trades, shooting at over 10 frames per second for action photos, a modern sensor that captures low light images, and in body image stabilization for more pictures with less camera shake.

This campaign will have a tremendous impact on my life, with state of the art gear I will have access to jobs that my technology is inadequate for. I am starting to have success as a photographer and with your help I could end up on the front page, the cover of a magazine, or at least get portrait photography jobs.

The Indiegogo InDemand campaign has ended, but you can find fantastic pre-order deals with up to $40 off retail prices in our new store at Fjorden.co:

 

 

 

 

Never miss the perfect shot again with Fjorden, the world's first pocketable, professional iPhone camera grip. Whether you're shooting street, portrait, or travel: Fjorden lets you achieve your creative vision.

 

 

 

 

 


 


 

 

iPhone photos have featured on the covers of Vogue, National Geographic, and Time Magazine. The phone in your pocket shoots professional-quality images — now Fjorden adds professional-quality camera controls. 

 

 

1. Two-Stage Shutter Button
Just like your real camera: Half-press to focus, full-press to capture the image.

2. Customizable Control Dial
Easily adjust exposure, shutter speed, ISO, portrait mode aperture, manual focus, and other parameters without changing your hand position.

3. Multi-Function Button
You choose what it does: Trigger portrait mode or selfie mode, select flash mode, or switch between other custom settings.

4. Zoom Lever
Quickly switch between iPhone lenses, or smoothly zoom in and out.

 

 

Just 10.7 mm (0.39in) deep, Fjorden's patent-pending design is the world's first pocketable iPhone camera grip with multiple physical camera controls.

Together with an iPhone 12 Pro, the depth is the same as an Apple AirPods case and guaranteed to fit into a skinny jeans pocket — so you can always have a professional camera with you.

 

 

The iOS Fjorden Camera App is a professional, intuitive camera app for fast, one-handed shooting. Shoot in “Full Auto” to let the iPhone work its magic, or take manual control of camera parameters.

Fjorden Camera App demo:
column3:
showinfo=0"">

 

The Fjorden Camera App’s user interface is fully customizable. Freely assign features or parameters to Fjorden's hardware controls to create the personalized camera of your dreams.

App UI customization demo:

column1: • Compatibility: All iPhones running iOS 14 or newer
• Focusing Modes: AI Object Tracking, AF-Single, Manual with Focus Peaking
• File Formats: RAW, ProRAW (depending on iPhone model), JPG, HEIC
• …additional features being developed continuously by our in-house team!

As an Indiegogo Backer, you will receive priority beta test access (via TestFlight), so you can directly influence the app's development.

 

 

 

 

ProCamera is an award-winning “Swiss Army Knife” for iOS photography, bursting with state-of-the-art technology for photography, video, and editing.

 

 


Obscura brings the kind of controls you’d expect from a professional DSLR to your iPhone. Designed with intuitive controls, ergonomic design and beautiful filters, Obscura is the camera that gets out of your way.  Obscura will work seamlessly with Fjorden when it ships.

 

 

We love Moment's M-Series lenses, so we’ve made Fjorden’s iPhone MagSafe cases compatible with them. The Moment M-Series lens mount (available for all iPhone 12 and future models) series snaps right into our Fjorden iPhone 12-series MagSafe cases.

 


When you're done shooting, Fjorden serves as a fully adjustable iPhone kickstand. Use it in portrait mode for video calls or notifications on your desk
column2:
rotate it to landscape mode for watching Netflix with your morning coffee.

 

 

With its quick-release clip, Fjorden snaps in and out of the Fjorden MagSafe cases in less than a second. When you upgrade your iPhone, simply swap Fjorden over to your new device.

 

 

 

Fjorden's iPhone cases for iPhone series 11, 12, and future iPhones are MagSafe-compatible. Easily mount them onto wireless chargers, car mounts, or MagSafe tripods.

 

 

 

Fjorden connects via Bluetooth and lets you shoot remotely using a tripod — perfect for shake-free night- and astrophotography.

 

 

 

A standard CR2032 coin cell provides up to 12 months of battery life and is easily swapped via the battery tray.
 

 



In decisive moments, Fjorden gives you speed and precision. It's discreet and doesn't draw attention. Control exposure to play with architectural shapes and shadows, create light trails at night, capture the feeling of your city.

 

 

 

Pocket-friendly, super-light, and with year-long battery life, Fjorden lets you bring a pro compact camera everywhere. Set precise shutter speed and ISO to match the light, blur the motion of rivers and waterfalls, soak up the atmosphere of unfamiliar places.

 

 

 

Less intimidating than a big camera, Fjorden lets you connect with your model. Capture facial expressions and poses at just the right moment, focus precisely with object/face tracking or with manual focus peaking.

 

 


Whether you're climbing, biking, skiing, or flying, Fjorden lets you shoot one-handed with full control over all parameters - even while wearing gloves.

 

 

 

When your kid is taking its first steps, when they meet their grandparents for the first time, and in other magical moments — you'll have a professional camera in your pocket to capture these memories.

 

 

 

Fjorden is designed to be used over multiple phone generations. We're offering a two-year warranty and a full 30-day money-back guarantee. If Fjorden falls short of your expectations, return it, and we will refund you
column3:
no questions asked.

 

 

We care about our planet and will do whatever we can to minimize our environmental footprint. We are committing to become a Climate Neutral Certified company, meaning that we will measure, offset, and reduce all the carbon it takes to make and deliver our products. Additionally, we will join the “1% For The Planet” pledge to donate 1% of sales to environmental causes.

 

 

Photographer, award-winning scientist, and experienced entrepreneur. Previously founded Mendeley, one of the world's largest platforms for scientific collaboration. Fellow of the Royal Society of Arts, former Tech Advisor to the UK &
column4:
Dutch Government, ex-Professor at VU Amsterdam, Ph.D. from Bauhaus University Weimar.

 

 

 

 

As a company, Fjorden believes in combining beautiful, well-made hardware with intuitive software that “just works” in order to create a brilliant user experience. If you are an exceptional iOS developer aiming to build class-leading camera software and computational photography tools, we are hiring — so get in touch at jobs@fjorden.co!

 

 

 

 

 

Created in Oslo, Fjorden combines the clean minimalism of contemporary Norwegian design with the timeless modernist aesthetic of the Bauhaus idea “form follows function”. 

Fjorden's angular camera control panel and gently sloping kickstand hinge evoke the peaks and waves of the Norwegian fjords. Form follows function: The shape provides a secure, ergonomic grip and puts every single button, dial, and lever into the reach of your index finger, enabling you to shoot single-handed — even with gloves.

 

 

To ensure premium manufacturing quality and a long-lasting design, we are working with Scott N. Miller as our manufacturing lead. Scott is the Founder &
column5:
CEO of Dragon Innovation/Dragon Ventures and has helped to build and scale the manufacturing of companies like Roomba, Ring, Pebble, MakerBot, and reMarkable.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Currently, we are planning to ship from warehouses in the US, Germany, and Hong Kong. Shortly before we ship your Fjorden order, we will invite you to our pledge manager, in which you will be able to:

column1: Shipping charges will depend on the destination country and region. Here are approximate estimates:

With the planned warehouse locations in the US and Germany, there should not be any additional import taxes in the US, Canada, and EU countries. In other countries (like our home, Norway), you might be responsible for local import taxes. We will do our best to minimize or avoid these.
• Ergonomic grip for normal and selfie mode

Fjorden Grip: 

80.3(w) x 59.4(h) x 10.7(d) mm

Fjorden Case: 

iPhone dimensions + 2.4(d) mm

Pocketability/Total Depth: 

21.3 mm (iPhone 12 Pro + Fjorden Case + Fjorden Grip), same depth as an Apple AirPods case

Fjorden Universal Back Plate Adapter: 

82.7(w) x 61.8(h) x 2.4(d) mm
• Fully customizable UI for fast, one-handed shooting
• Supported formats: JPG, HEIC, RAW, ProRaw + combinations
• Enables assignment of Manual Controls to Physical Features
• Focus modes: AF-S, AF-C, face tracking, object tracking and manual
• Film Simulations to capture look of classic analog films
• Fjorden MagSafe iPhone Cases: iPhone 11, 12, and future series
• Fjorden Universal Back Plate Adapter: Any iPhone (with 3M adhesive)
• Battery Life: 6-12 months, replaceable coin cell battery

>

 

To ensure we meet the needs and budget of every customer, we are launching with two different models of Vezo. Our premium model has AI drowsiness detection and real-time notifications while the dash cam is ""sleeping"" (ie. updates on accidents when your car is parked). The standard model is cheaper, and comes with every single feature except the AI and sleep notifications.
column6: >
column7: >
column11: >
column20:
>

 

Brought to You by ArVizon
column21:
>

 

ArVizon is a hardware company that produces smart automotive solutions. We created Vezo 360 to make a more versatile dashcam that brings both security and enjoyment to people's lives.

Starting a year and a half ago with a passion to create the most full-featured dashcam ever, we used our previous machine learning and autonomous driving research to build Vezo 360 AI's cutting edge drowsiness detection feature. We enhanced Vezo's ""killer app"" with the best optics, the sleekest design, the most functionality that we could. Now, prototyping is finished and we only need crowdfunding from you before we head into quality control and production. Help us make Vezo a reality.

column1: The Unleashed puts complete control over your DSLR into the palm of your hand – right from your smartphone. It’s the first DSLR remote control that you won’t even notice is there. It becomes one with the camera’s design and won’t get in the way of what you love doing: taking photos and videos.

column3:
>

 

We are proud to announce a cooperation between foolography and Triggertrap and making our Unleashed compatible with the Triggertrap app, and the Triggertrap app compatible with the Unleashed. You can use both our app as well as all the cool triggering features of the Triggertrap app that people might already be used to, but now wirelessly with your Unleashed!
column6:
>

 

Developing the Unleashed, we had one big design goal: it’s tiny size. You can leave the Unleashed on the camera at all times, even when packing it into your bag. The hot shoe stays free so you can keep using your external or popup flash, LED panels or shotgun mics.
column8:
>

The Unleashed is the first wireless remote that gives you complete control over your DSLR – as if it was still in your hands. Experience a professionally designed app for Android and iOS that lets you change all the important settings: aperture, shutter speed, ISO, white balance, exposure compensation and much more.
column10:
>

 

With this you can easily get the perfect shot, no matter if you’re behind or in front of the camera, right next to it or further away. Change settings and trigger at the right moment– without even touching the camera.
column11: >
column13: '>
column17:
>

Everyone loves videos. So do we. The Unleashed lets you start and stop videos from a distance and easily adjust your settings for the next scene or while you film.
column20:
>

We designed the Unleashed to be ready whenever you want to use it. It doesn’t need to be charged, and automatically reconnects to your smartphone via Bluetooth Low Energy so you don’t need to reconfigure your wifi settings each time you shoot remotely! It’s Plug’n’Play and always ready to use.
column22:
>

One of the biggest advantages of digital photography is the possibility to instantly see results. This is too cool to miss when shooting remotely, so the Unleashed will send a thumbnail to your smartphone for quick review and checking exposure. And if needed, simply adjust the settings right from your smartphone to get that shot you wanted!
column25:
>

 

Wireless remote control is vital for vibration free long exposures, breathtaking startrails, as well as epic timelapses. The Unleashed allows interval shooting and even supports carefully controlled exposure ramping for smooth day to night transitions – the “holy grail” of timelapses. In addition to setting the exposure ramp manually as depicted, we are working on a fully automatic mode with the help of Gunther Wegner, the author of LRTimelapse - the de facto standard in timelapse post production software.

column4:
>

 

The Unleashed can use your smartphone’s location or a Bluetooth GPS receiver for direct geotagging. The exact GPS location of where you take the photo is saved in its metadata immediately. Relive your vacation by viewing your photos on a map. Or find pictures of your favorite spots by simply zooming in on their location, without having to remember exactly when you were there. Almost every photo management software already supports geotagging.
column5: >
column6:
>

There are times when you have to work with more than one camera. Either you’re taking photos at a wedding or shooting a video. You could be behind the main camera, but with our app you can control up to six cameras at once. Start recording at the same time, trigger all cameras at the right moment, or synchronize settings beforehand. Don’t worry about missing a moment or an angle, even if you’re missing a crew.
column8:
>

We believe in reliability. To reach our expectations of quality, our Unleashed is completely Made In Germany. We make sure the Unleashed is produced locally, because in our experience, a close relationship with the manufacturers is what makes the difference. Because making high-end products means going strong right from the start.
column10:
>

We don’t want any bulky devices or cables that go from one end of the camera to the other. We think camera accessories like ours need to be unobtrusive and merge with the camera so that you can leave them on the camera the whole time. With this goal, we tried to build a product that would fit on all DSLRs from both Nikon and Canon. However, during the R&
column11: D phase we soon realized that this would not be possible, at least not without compromising on key characteristics we wanted the Unleashed to have. This is why the Unleashed will be available in a few different versions that will fit perfectly to your camera model: The very same product in slightly different formats.
column13: >
column15:
>

Being hobby photographers ourselves, we are very passionate about what we do. This is what drives us – it did at the start, and still does today. Our first commercial product, the Unleashed ’09 is a Bluetooth module allowing the exact GPS location to be written in the photos’ metadata the instant you press the shutter. Back in 2007, when Oliver was looking for a product that would let him geotag his photos directly with his Nikon D200, he couldn’t find anything viable on the market. He made some prototypes of a Bluetooth geotagging solution for himself and some friends, but received so much interest online that he founded foolography, built and launched the Unleashed ’09 in 2009. Until today there is no geotagging solution more convenient than the Unleashed ’09 :-)
column17:
>

 

That’s how it all started. Today, after more than seven years in the hardware business, two successful product lines with thousands of happy customers, a move to Berlin in 2014 and a strong leadership team of Oliver and Ken, we’re finally ready to launch an idea conceived early 2013. Our next product: the Unleashed.
column18: >
column19: >
column20: >
column21: >
column22: >
column23: >
column25:
>

 

 

Bringing the Unleashed to life and getting it into your hands is our biggest goal! We want nothing more than for you to be a happy customer who loves using the Unleashed. – Maybe even on a daily basis.

As you can see in our timeline, we’ve planned to work on our parts in parallel, so we never have idle periods while waiting on our suppliers. However, as you can imagine, we can’t foresee everything, due to our dependencies on other parties, as well as changing lead times of electronic components. What we can promise though, is that we will do our very best to adhere to our timeline, motivate our partners to deliver on time and that we will have transparent communication with our backers/supporters to keep you updated as well as we can.
column26:
>

A huge THANK YOU for your invaluable support: Alex, Angélene, Basti, Ben, Christin, Christina, Daniel, Jessy, Johannes, Lennart, Maria, Marius, Sophia, and Tim.

We want nothing more than for you to be a happy customer who loves using the Unleashed. – Maybe even on a daily basis.As you can see in our timeline, we’ve planned to work on our parts in parallel, so we never have idle periods while waiting on our suppliers. However, as you can imagine, we can’t foresee everything, due to our dependencies on other parties, as well as changing lead times of electronic components. MAYA is an enlarger timer that is designed help you create beautiful prints in your darkroom by offering you all the functionality you'll probably ever need. It can also help you develop your film by timing your development, fixing and other processes and with the modular interface, it might even one day develop your film and slow cook your food for you!

We've started working on the project a few seconds after our old darkroom timer broke down. Realizing all the possible replacements were either lacking almost everything we'd like to have in a timer or having absolutely horrible interfaces with requiring button push combinations and no clear display to communicate with you, we took the matters into our own hands and started building a better product.

Even though we've started designing MAYA for our own use in the first place, getting it out there for the whole analog community was always something we had in mind. We wanted to give something capable to well seasoned master printers so that their prints will be even easier to make and at the same time, we always wanted to give a warm welcome to the newcomes to the world of enlarging.

For those who are on a budget or simply dislike seeing lots of lights in their faces, we knew we had to create a simpler alternative that would also be cheaper. However, all the core functionality had to be there. So maybe for the first time ever, we are democratising the F-Stop adjustments, test strip modes and almost all the other features that the most expensive timers have. That's right, our cheaper MAYA White Edition hardly is an entry model. Where it differs from the Black Edition is the interface, extension capability and the choice of materials.
Finally, we've reached a point in the prototyping phase where we're happy to present you with. So, here it is.

With the clean interface and dual rotary dials, you can quickly navigate between the menus and manipulate settings. You don't have to remember button combinations or try to decipher meaningless error codes, everything is displayed very clearly on the main LCD. And when you are ready, all you have to do is to press the Focus or the Expose buttons to direcly access the most important functions.

If you are remotely interested in photography, you've probably heard of stops. All the exposure values in both photographing and printing are related to each other. Which means you can change your aperture one stop (from f/8 to f/5.6 for example) and compensate that with one stop of a change in the exposure time.

In darkroom practice, you can also speak in F-Stops or Exposure Values (EV) when you want to modify your print in a particular way. If you want your subject to appear slightly brighter, you can decrease the exposure time by 1/3 stops or if you want a much darker background, you can go for a 1.5 stop longer exposure.

Since they are so practical to think in, we've implemented F-Stop editing anywhere we could. You can edit in EV when you're adjusting your base time, when you want to add a dodge or burn time or you can even specify EV increments between your test strips.
Everything will be much faster to work with. You no longer have to guess what 1/4 stops of burning would require for a sky that was exposed for 43"" at f/11.
Adjusting the Base Time in 0.1 Seconds and/or EV (F-Stop) Mode

It is very easy to set a time for countdown and you can even modify it in either seconds or F-stop values. The left dial makes large adjustments while the right one makes smaller adjustments. While under 10 seconds, the left one adds or subtracts 1"" to your base time while the right one does the same with 0.1"". Over 10 seconds, they become much faster and add/subtract 10"" and 1"" respectively. In the F-Stop mode, they adjust in 1 EV and 0.1 EV respectively.
Timing test strips is easier than ever. Having an F-Stop based strip mode makes it so much easier to nail down the required base time, even with papers and negatives you don't have experience with.

Since each individual exposure time is automatically calculated within a set F-Stop difference of each other (as opposed to simply increasing it by 5"" each time), you'll get even exposure differences between each test strip instead of all the darker ones looking similar to each other while the brighter ones have significant jumps in exposure.

You can decide on the number of strips you want as well as the EV difference between them. You can have your starting value as the middle strip or the shortest exposure time. You can even choose to do all your strips on a single piece of paper or individual ones. And you can set your favorite settings as the default mode so you'll never have to adjust them every single time.

You got your base time in the ballpark but you want to refine it further? You can go to your preferred settings for the REFINE mode with a single click and do a test with a much tighter spread. Once again, you can set the defaults for this mode so all you have to do is simply click REFINE after selecting your candidate from the initial run.

You can record up to 9 separate dodge and burn actions per memory channel. After doing the base exposure, MAYA will remind you which dodge/burn areas you've set and how long you need to expose them for. All adjustments are EV based so all you have to do is to enter how much lighter/darker you want a particular area. You can even set them separately for each filter while doing split grade printing.

Having two channels per memory bank, you can use them for split grade printing. The grade display will remind you which filter you have to use. Each channel stores and recalls separate base times along with dodge and burn times.
Compensation with Smart Resize, Aperture Compensation and Dry-down Offset

You've changed the aperture on your lens, paper size or simply you want to manually adjust your settings by some amount? MAYA will take care of all the calculations. You just enter in the values you want. You can even compensate both memory channels if you're doing split grade printing. You can also specify an offset amount to give you more headroom for dry-down or toning.

Even though both models have twin channels for split grade printing (or simply for working on two prints at once), Black Edition takes it several steps further by offering 6 memory banks, each with two channels. That way you can save all your settings for a negative that you print often, go back and forth between two variations of a single print, have multiple people use MAYA without disturbing each other's print recipes or use one memory position to time the paper developer and toning, which will give you much more consistent results.
Here are some videos of the prototype in use:
This wasn't the main goal when we started developing MAYA but since everything that is needed is already in, we simply said why not.

Select your film and developer settings from the list or simply add a custom one. Then enter the recommended development time. The whole development will be timed and you'll be reminded to agitate the tank at required times (every minute or every 30 seconds as you've chosen). You'll also get a visual and audible notification towards the end to pour out. You can even use the memory banks (separately from the darkroom timer memory banks) to store your favorite development settings and get consistent development each and every time.
What is more? We are also working on a thermometer module so that MAYA will compensate the development time for the changes in chemicals' temperature.

Unless you want to turn your enlarger off and on manually, you'll also need a power bar. If all you want to do is develop some film or make prints without any automation, you obviously don't need these.

The power bars will both power MAYA and your other darkroom tools such as your enlargers, safelight, room light and maybe a paper flasher you've built. All sockets are connected to internal relays so they'll automatically be switched off and on as required.

For the most basic functions, which is enlarger and safelight control, PB2 with two power sockets will suffice. For more complicated tasks, PB3 and PB4 are recommended which have 3 and 4 sockets respectively. All sockets are reprogrammable as an enlarger, safelight, roomlight, paper flasher and a second enlarger. The more sockets you have, the more flexible the whole setup becomes.
You can choose to have footswitches, desk switches, hand remotes to trigger various functions such as countdown, focus, split grade channels and even toggle your room lights between red and white.

You can assign two different functions and select them by using the sliding switch. You can attach masks using paper clips to use when making a test strip, dodging and burning and start the exposure, change the split grade channel and start your second exposure without taking your hands off.

Compact and easy to use by hand. Has a slide switch to select between two assigned functions and has a big, soft and red button to trigger it. Can be used on a desk or can be attached to the side of the enlarger.
Slightly harder to press by hand but since it's made of metal, it's usable as a footswitch. Can be assigned a single function.
Usable on your workbench or on the floor, each of the metal switches can be assigned to trigger different functions.

You can also make your own remotes or use the ones you have (from almost any brand, even guitar amp and tattoo machine footswitches can be used). The required adapters, schematics for building your own remote and the physical interface (type of accessory port) will be announced later on.

At the current point, we need some time and money to go on with developing this product any further. What we also need to see is how many of you are interested in this project. We've talked to many photographers of different experience levels to determine what needs to be in the design, now we need to know how many of you are out there.

In short, we need to have a better idea on the market size to determine what the final shape of the product will be. 50 of us out there? This'll be a boutique, handmade, hand assembled product. 250 of us are enough to turn this into a semi-mass produced product with a different finish, maybe material choices and production methods, as well as some interesting add-ons. 1000s of us analog photographers? That means we'll have the budget to use even more sophisticated production methods, start working on some really interesting projects.

No matter what, we will keep on working on various add-ons, accessories and even bigger things such as SD-Card reader to save your recipes, multigrade controllers for enlarger heads with built in filters, thermometers to measure your developers and auto-compensate development times and even a fully automated film processor and a completely new LED multigrade enlarger from the ground up! A more successful campaign will only make things much faster.

Like the promises but you have something more in mind? From the day one, we've had the idea of making the project go open-source at one point. Some elements of the hardware and software will be shared publicly, so you can develop your own sensors, buttons, a custom power unit and even a relay box for your own needs.

If everything goes well and we become confident in going full open source, we will certainly do so as it'll only benefit all parties involved. If we receive the funds to develop a stable and flexible platform for all of our (both us and you!) darkroom needs, we're hoping to release both the firmware and the hardware specs so anyone can develop and carry the whole project to points we can't even imagine at this point.
Here are the ways you can contribute:

Did you know we also make one of the better designed leather camera straps on the market? Whether or not you want to participate in one of the more serious perks, you can choose to buy a $15 gift card, valid in our Etsy Store, for only $10.

You like the idea, you'd like to use MAYA as a film developer but you don't have a darkroom yet? No worries, you can simply buy MAYA and start using it as a film developer with auto temperature compensation. If you ever build yourself a darkroom later on, you can always choose to buy one of the power units to make it enlarger-capable.
You want the enlarger control along with the safelight control and all the features we have built in but don't exactly need the Black Edition interface? This one is for you.

For those who are slightly more ambitious, which means those who need a 3-socket power unit. Guessing it's for the room light control, which is one of our favorite functions. Or do you have something else in your mind? Care to share?

You want the whole deal... We can't blame you. After all, we did the whole design around this package and if you like all the bells and whistles (Lights and buttons in this case), this is the one you need. Comes with a 3-plug power unit so  you can control both your safelight AND your room light. Or maybe a paper flasher? Also available as an Early Bird package! Also also comes with a free remote of your choice!

The truly ambitious package. You didn't only like the the full package, you want to go beyond it. For whatever reason, you need those 4 sockets. Maybe for a second enlarger. Maybe just in case... Whatever you have in mind, we're throwing in two remotes of your choice for you. Enjoy!
This is getting really interesting. What are you buying it for? Are you buying for a school? Are you one of the last remaining photo labs in your area? We'd certainly like to have a chat with you.
For other group purchases, please don't hesitate to reach us.

We are already deep into our prototyping phase. Most of the coding has been done, interface has been designed, so apart from the finishing touches here and there, we need to find a supplier for the PCBs, various parts and the casing. Of course, the final physical form of everything can only be determined after we have a good number of how many units we'll have to make. More than a few dozen units and we'll be able to afford custom made electronic boards, extruded aluminium chassis and even injection molding.  In more limited numbers, we'll have to stick to off-the-shelf electronic modules and a folded chassis with laser cut plates.
The exact design of the interface will be finalized after the crowdfunding campaign.
We're already in touch with some manufacturers but to order various prototypes, we need the funds and some time. Here's the schedule we have in mind at the moment:
Late April 2019: Finalize the case design and get some prototypes made
May 2019: Final testing, Order Release Candidate PCB and casing

Having a healthier funding will let us go through more prototypes in less time and also start working on all the other projects that we've mentioned above. We'll also be able to afford more industrial production methods such as prebuilt PCBs so even though we'll end up spending more time on the design phase, the production phase will be much easier on us so we'll still be able to respect the delivery dates we've suggested above.

Hope you've liked what you've seen and we honestly hope there are enough darkroom printers in the world so we can elevate this project to a point where a new era of analog photography related gear can be based on.

Even if you're not interested in participating in this crowdfunding project, please, spread the word. Drop us a line. Share a comment. Discuss your own ideas and criticise ours! There have been a great collaboration for this project by quite a few members of the online analog communities so even if you can't physically help this project reach its goal, let us know that we have some support.

In darkroom practice, you can also speak in F-Stops or Exposure Values (EV) when you want to modify your print in a particular way. If you want your subject to appear slightly brighter, you can decrease the exposure time by 1/3 stops or if you want a much darker background, you can go for a 1.5 stop longer exposure.

Since they are so practical to think in, we've implemented F-Stop editing anywhere we could. You can edit in EV when you're adjusting your base time, when you want to add a dodge or burn time or you can even specify EV increments between your test strips.
Everything will be much faster to work with. You no longer have to guess what 1/4 stops of burning would require for a sky that was exposed for 43"" at f/11.
Adjusting the Base Time in 0.1 Seconds and/or EV (F-Stop) Mode

It is very easy to set a time for countdown and you can even modify it in either seconds or F-stop values. The left dial makes large adjustments while the right one makes smaller adjustments. While under 10 seconds, the left one adds or subtracts 1"" to your base time while the right one does the same with 0.1"". Over 10 seconds, they become much faster and add/subtract 10"" and 1"" respectively. In the F-Stop mode, they adjust in 1 EV and 0.1 EV respectively.
Test Strip Mode with EV Steps
Timing test strips is easier than ever. Having an F-Stop based strip mode makes it so much easier to nail down the required base time, even with papers and negatives you don't have experience with.

Since each individual exposure time is automatically calculated within a set F-Stop difference of each other (as opposed to simply increasing it by 5"" each time), you'll get even exposure differences between each test strip instead of all the darker ones looking similar to each other while the brighter ones have significant jumps in exposure.

You can decide on the number of strips you want as well as the EV difference between them. You can have your starting value as the middle strip or the shortest exposure time. You can even choose to do all your strips on a single piece of paper or individual ones. And you can set your favorite settings as the default mode so you'll never have to adjust them every single time.

You got your base time in the ballpark but you want to refine it further? You can go to your preferred settings for the REFINE mode with a single click and do a test with a much tighter spread. Once again, you can set the defaults for this mode so all you have to do is simply click REFINE after selecting your candidate from the initial run.
F-Stop Based Dodge and Burn Timers

You can record up to 9 separate dodge and burn actions per memory channel. After doing the base exposure, MAYA will remind you which dodge/burn areas you've set and how long you need to expose them for. All adjustments are EV based so all you have to do is to enter how much lighter/darker you want a particular area. You can even set them separately for each filter while doing split grade printing.

Having two channels per memory bank, you can use them for split grade printing. The grade display will remind you which filter you have to use. Each channel stores and recalls separate base times along with dodge and burn times.
Compensation with Smart Resize, Aperture Compensation and Dry-down Offset

You've changed the aperture on your lens, paper size or simply you want to manually adjust your settings by some amount? MAYA will take care of all the calculations. You just enter in the values you want. You can even compensate both memory channels if you're doing split grade printing. You can also specify an offset amount to give you more headroom for dry-down or toning.

Even though both models have twin channels for split grade printing (or simply for working on two prints at once), Black Edition takes it several steps further by offering 6 memory banks, each with two channels. That way you can save all your settings for a negative that you print often, go back and forth between two variations of a single print, have multiple people use MAYA without disturbing each other's print recipes or use one memory position to time the paper developer and toning, which will give you much more consistent results.
Here are some videos of the prototype in use:
This wasn't the main goal when we started developing MAYA but since everything that is needed is already in, we simply said why not.

Select your film and developer settings from the list or simply add a custom one. Then enter the recommended development time. The whole development will be timed and you'll be reminded to agitate the tank at required times (every minute or every 30 seconds as you've chosen). You'll also get a visual and audible notification towards the end to pour out. You can even use the memory banks (separately from the darkroom timer memory banks) to store your favorite development settings and get consistent development each and every time.
What is more? We are also working on a thermometer module so that MAYA will compensate the development time for the changes in chemicals' temperature.

Unless you want to turn your enlarger off and on manually, you'll also need a power bar. If all you want to do is develop some film or make prints without any automation, you obviously don't need these.

The power bars will both power MAYA and your other darkroom tools such as your enlargers, safelight, room light and maybe a paper flasher you've built. All sockets are connected to internal relays so they'll automatically be switched off and on as required.

For the most basic functions, which is enlarger and safelight control, PB2 with two power sockets will suffice. For more complicated tasks, PB3 and PB4 are recommended which have 3 and 4 sockets respectively. All sockets are reprogrammable as an enlarger, safelight, roomlight, paper flasher and a second enlarger. The more sockets you have, the more flexible the whole setup becomes.
You can choose to have footswitches, desk switches, hand remotes to trigger various functions such as countdown, focus, split grade channels and even toggle your room lights between red and white.

You can assign two different functions and select them by using the sliding switch. You can attach masks using paper clips to use when making a test strip, dodging and burning and start the exposure, change the split grade channel and start your second exposure without taking your hands off.

Compact and easy to use by hand. Has a slide switch to select between two assigned functions and has a big, soft and red button to trigger it. Can be used on a desk or can be attached to the side of the enlarger.
Slightly harder to press by hand but since it's made of metal, it's usable as a footswitch. Can be assigned a single function.
Usable on your workbench or on the floor, each of the metal switches can be assigned to trigger different functions.

You can also make your own remotes or use the ones you have (from almost any brand, even guitar amp and tattoo machine footswitches can be used). The required adapters, schematics for building your own remote and the physical interface (type of accessory port) will be announced later on.

At the current point, we need some time and money to go on with developing this product any further. What we also need to see is how many of you are interested in this project. We've talked to many photographers of different experience levels to determine what needs to be in the design, now we need to know how many of you are out there.

In short, we need to have a better idea on the market size to determine what the final shape of the product will be. 50 of us out there? This'll be a boutique, handmade, hand assembled product. 250 of us are enough to turn this into a semi-mass produced product with a different finish, maybe material choices and production methods, as well as some interesting add-ons. 1000s of us analog photographers? That means we'll have the budget to use even more sophisticated production methods, start working on some really interesting projects.

No matter what, we will keep on working on various add-ons, accessories and even bigger things such as SD-Card reader to save your recipes, multigrade controllers for enlarger heads with built in filters, thermometers to measure your developers and auto-compensate development times and even a fully automated film processor and a completely new LED multigrade enlarger from the ground up! A more successful campaign will only make things much faster.

Like the promises but you have something more in mind? From the day one, we've had the idea of making the project go open-source at one point. Some elements of the hardware and software will be shared publicly, so you can develop your own sensors, buttons, a custom power unit and even a relay box for your own needs.

If everything goes well and we become confident in going full open source, we will certainly do so as it'll only benefit all parties involved. If we receive the funds to develop a stable and flexible platform for all of our (both us and you!) darkroom needs, we're hoping to release both the firmware and the hardware specs so anyone can develop and carry the whole project to points we can't even imagine at this point.
Here are the ways you can contribute:

Did you know we also make one of the better designed leather camera straps on the market? Whether or not you want to participate in one of the more serious perks, you can choose to buy a $15 gift card, valid in our Etsy Store, for only $10.

You like the idea, you'd like to use MAYA as a film developer but you don't have a darkroom yet? No worries, you can simply buy MAYA and start using it as a film developer with auto temperature compensation. If you ever build yourself a darkroom later on, you can always choose to buy one of the power units to make it enlarger-capable.
You want the enlarger control along with the safelight control and all the features we have built in but don't exactly need the Black Edition interface? This one is for you.

For those who are slightly more ambitious, which means those who need a 3-socket power unit. Guessing it's for the room light control, which is one of our favorite functions. Or do you have something else in your mind? Care to share?

You want the whole deal... We can't blame you. After all, we did the whole design around this package and if you like all the bells and whistles (Lights and buttons in this case), this is the one you need. Comes with a 3-plug power unit so  you can control both your safelight AND your room light. Or maybe a paper flasher? Also available as an Early Bird package! Also also comes with a free remote of your choice!

The truly ambitious package. You didn't only like the the full package, you want to go beyond it. For whatever reason, you need those 4 sockets. Maybe for a second enlarger. Maybe just in case... Whatever you have in mind, we're throwing in two remotes of your choice for you. Enjoy!
This is getting really interesting. What are you buying it for? Are you buying for a school? Are you one of the last remaining photo labs in your area? We'd certainly like to have a chat with you.
For other group purchases, please don't hesitate to reach us.

We are already deep into our prototyping phase. Most of the coding has been done, interface has been designed, so apart from the finishing touches here and there, we need to find a supplier for the PCBs, various parts and the casing. Of course, the final physical form of everything can only be determined after we have a good number of how many units we'll have to make. More than a few dozen units and we'll be able to afford custom made electronic boards, extruded aluminium chassis and even injection molding.  In more limited numbers, we'll have to stick to off-the-shelf electronic modules and a folded chassis with laser cut plates.
The exact design of the interface will be finalized after the crowdfunding campaign.
We're already in touch with some manufacturers but to order various prototypes, we need the funds and some time. Here's the schedule we have in mind at the moment:
Late April 2019: Finalize the case design and get some prototypes made
May 2019: Final testing, Order Release Candidate PCB and casing
Late June/Early July 2019: First batch delivery

Having a healthier funding will let us go through more prototypes in less time and also start working on all the other projects that we've mentioned above. We'll also be able to afford more industrial production methods such as prebuilt PCBs so even though we'll end up spending more time on the design phase, the production phase will be much easier on us so we'll still be able to respect the delivery dates we've suggested above.

Hope you've liked what you've seen and we honestly hope there are enough darkroom printers in the world so we can elevate this project to a point where a new era of analog photography related gear can be based on.

Even if you're not interested in participating in this crowdfunding project, please, spread the word. Drop us a line. Share a comment. Discuss your own ideas and criticise ours! There have been a great collaboration for this project by quite a few members of the online analog communities so even if you can't physically help this project reach its goal, let us know that we have some support.

>The Moon by 1-Ring is the most advanced and versatile Smart Home Solution and a Security Camera in the world.
It features a revolutionary stabilized 360° levitation technology and allows easy integration of modern Smart Home and legacy devices into your personal Internet of Things.

>The proprietary technology used in the Moon provides for a noiseless, jerk-free and fully controllable levitation that has no equal on the consumer market. The Moon by 1-Ring can rotate smoothly and without delay in any direction and is charged wirelessly for 24/7 uninterrupted operation.

>
Unite your home and office appliances into your very own Internet of Things using the Moon by 1-Ring as the central Smart Hub. Combining major home automation standards, inbuilt sensors and a programmable IR Blaster the Moon by 1-Ring allows you to remotely control your home from anywhere in the world. Automate your daily routines with the moon Commander app to make the most out of your free time.

>Should the Moon by 1-Ring detect movement or noise it will automatically rotate towards it, take a snapshot or respond in a predefined way. You can also take direct control of the camera to record a video, make a snapshot or communicate two-way at any time.

column4: >The Moon by 1-Ring's easily customizable Guard Mode will help keep both your home and office safe and secure e.g integrating a home alarm, or using our built-in Presence Simulation tool to let the Moon by 1-Ring occasionally switch on lights and other devices in a realistic pattern.
column6: >

/>

Video chatting with your family or working together with colleagues abroad has never been easier or felt more natural. Connect the Moon by 1-Ring to a conference application of choice and use it as an interactive webcam. High-quality speakers and noise-canceling microphones ensure that you truly are a participant in any meeting, not just an observer.

column1:
As everyone else, we have been facing the desire to automate our homes, but we, as lot’s of you, were facing a market with many smart home solutions which are either proprietary based protocols or very limited expandability.

Two and a half years ago we came together to develop a solution that will become the center of our and hopefully your smart home – integrating all modern IoT standards with a groundbreaking home security camera that will not only be as versatile as no other camera ever before, but also become a real jewel in your home or office. Throughout our journey, more and more people have joined our project adding their ideas to the final product, making it as a versatile gadget for any situation: be it a single room bachelor apartment or a 2 story family house with a dog and two children.

After drafting the idea and looking for available solutions, we experimented extensively, creating several designs and multiple prototypes until we found a solution that seamlessly combines sophisticated electrical engineering, like our patented stabilized levitation technology within a state of the art design.

We have partnered with award-winning software and hardware engineers, that have worked on several other large-scale industrial projects to make sure that the final product meets our and your highest expectations.

28 Months later we stand here with a product with patented technology ready for mass production and are extremely excited to introduce the Moon by 1-Ring to the world.

We hope you will like and support our pursuit for a better, easy to use and beautiful Smart Home!
In addition to Moonlight Silver color, we unlocked two additional colors Galactic grey and Star White!

column2: >
>

column1: Is Moon Smart Home Solution for Any Home?
Is Government Watching You with Moon Camera?
Is Moon by 1 Ring Safe With Pets?
Will Thieves Steal Your Moon Smart Camera?
How Long Can Moon Smart Camera Levitate?
Will We Ship On Time?

Which countries do you ship to?

We ship worldwide.

Can I use the camera separately from the base unit?

Yes, you can also use the Moon by 1-Ring as a standalone device. To provide you with the best possible experience, we have integrated magnets to the bottom of the camera-unit, which allows the Moon by 1-Ring to be mounted on any magnetic surface. And with the Flexible Arm, you can mount the camera to almost any other surface.

Does the camera have a zoom?

Yes, the camera comes with up to 4x digital zoom.

Are there any additional costs associated with the camera (e.g. cloud storage or live streaming)?

No! There are no hidden fees or additional charges. You can either use popular cloud services like Dropbox, GoogleDrive or even your private FTP server or save the videos locally on a microSD card.

How do I access my captured videos and is there a timeline feature?

All videos can be accessed via the Moon Commander, our free of charge Android and iOS app. The Moon Commander supports time-lapse and automatically highlights segments where an alert has been triggered.

Can I schedule or turn off notifications? 

Of course! We are working hard to make the Moon Commander App as customisable as possible.

How secure is my data?

Your privacy is of the highest importance to us, so all data communication from and to the Moon by 1-Ring is protected by 265-bit Enterprise-grade encryption for your maximum security.

Will the Moon by 1-Ring work with my existing Smart Home devices?

Having ZigBee, Zwave and Bluetooth Smart on-board, we are able to integrate almost any device that operates within these standards.

Do you offer a Warranty?

The Moon by 1-Ring comes with a one-year, worldwide limited warranty.

","The Moon by 1-Ring is the most advanced and versatile Smart Home Solution and a Security Camera in the world.It features a revolutionary stabilized 360° levitation technology and allows easy integration of modern Smart Home and legacy devices into your personal Internet of Things.

The proprietary technology used in the Moon provides for a noiseless, jerk-free and fully controllable levitation that has no equal on the consumer market. The Moon by 1-Ring can rotate smoothly and without delay in any direction and is charged wirelessly for 24/7 uninterrupted operation.

Unite your home and office appliances into your very own Internet of Things using the Moon by 1-Ring as the central Smart Hub. Combining major home automation standards, inbuilt sensors and a programmable IR Blaster the Moon by 1-Ring allows you to remotely control your home from anywhere in the world. Automate your daily routines with the moon Commander app to make the most out of your free time.

Should the Moon by 1-Ring detect movement or noise it will automatically rotate towards it, take a snapshot or respond in a predefined way. You can also take direct control of the camera to record a video, make a snapshot or communicate two-way at any time.

The Moon by 1-Ring's easily customizable Guard Mode will help keep both your home and office safe and secure e.g integrating a home alarm, or using our built-in Presence Simulation tool to let the Moon by 1-Ring occasionally switch on lights and other devices in a realistic pattern. Video chatting with your family or working together with colleagues abroad has never been easier or felt more natural. Connect the Moon by 1-Ring to a conference application of choice and use it as an interactive webcam. High-quality speakers and noise-canceling microphones ensure that you truly are a participant in any meeting, not just an observer.

A tripod and camera backpack built to survive the elements, with a reduced impact on the environment

column4:
>Creators rely on their gear to tell their stories. But they're often held back by cheap equipment that breaks and requires expensive repair and replacement.

Not only does this impact our ability to get the shot, but it contributes to a throwaway culture that devastates our environment.

With over 100 years of manufacturing excellence and craftsmanship, we set out to develop a new standard of products that are better for the photographer, and the planet.

Meet Légende, travel photography gear designed to last. Made from premium eco-friendly materials and offering free spare parts and an unlimited warranty. Légende offers content creators peace of mind with high-quality gear they can depend on.

CHIPS 3.0 Motorized Slider Dolly is 5-axis interlink motion control system, enabling you to create silky smooth 5 axis movement by interlinking with DJI &
column5:
Feiyu gimbal is a YC Onion only feature that no other system in the market lets you do. No doubt that CHIPS 3.0 will take your filming experience to the next level!

Setting keyframes has never been such simple thanks to CHIPS 3.0 manual point setting feature! You can just move the sliding block or the dolly to the starting point and then confirm it on APP! Gimbal keyframes also can be set manually,  gives you the ability of full control over the movement of DJI &
column7:
Feiyu gimbal!

Add a joint, attach together, mount a tripod, then CHIPS sliders can transform into a motorized dolly. CHIPS 3.0 Motorized Slider Dolly allows you to capture incredible footage by creating linear and curved movements on the flat space. Perfect for interviews and motion time-lapses in urban settings. Our slider dolly is so portable that you can even put it in your to-go storage bag!

Linear Movement

Curved Movement

Compared to the traditional physical button, touch screen makes CHIPS 3.0 Motorized Slider more functional and attractive. You can easily set up a motion time-lapse on the module. Perfect for creators who want free control of the motion system.

 

CHIPS 3.0 uses ""YC Onion"" APP which features a simple interface that enables you to program gimbals, CHIPS 3.0 and all your YC Onion devices. APP Integration gives you full control remotely and the ability to create keyframes easily. All devices perform precise movements as you programmed. No matter you are a professional team or one-man band, CHIPS 3.0 Motorized Slider Dolly allows you to create unique, imaginative contents impressing your audience as your wish, anytime, anyplace.

Getting started with CHIPS 3.0 is super-fast and doesn’t require complicated setups. Designed to automate settings, CHIPS 3.0 allows you to focus more on creativity, quickly get into the zone, and capture smooth 5 axis shots at any time. 

Versatile, compact and lightweight yet super strong. CHIPS 3.0 can support camera gears up to 20kg horizontally which is around 2 times more than typical sliders, giving you enough leeway to use all your gears, even for cinema cameras!

CHIPS 3.0 module can be powered by Sony NP-F battery or power bank. With up to 10+ hours of run-time, you will never have to worry about battery runs out when shooting a time-lapse with CHIPS 3.0!

YC Onion is a high-tech enterprise develops, manufactures innovative camera gears including motorized camera slider, LED video lights, camera cages, teleprompter, follow focus, etc. All of YC Onion products have been named after food in order to give users a sense of food-like intimacy.

CHIPS 3.0 Motorized Slider Dolly is a creative 5 axis motion control system-slide, pan, tilt, roll and focus while pairing with DJI &
column9:
Feiyu gimbals.

*Notice: VAT and GST are not included in the price listed and will be determined by country on delivery. Backers are responsible for these costs (VAT, GST, duties, taxes, etc.) on delivery.

","CHIPS 3.0 Motorized Slider Dolly is 5-axis interlink motion control system, enabling you to create silky smooth 5 axis movement by interlinking with DJI & ZHIYUN & Feiyu gimbals. Interlinking with DJI & ZHIYUN & Feiyu gimbal is a YC Onion only feature that no other system in the market lets you do. No doubt that CHIPS 3.0 will take your filming experience to the next level!Setting keyframes has never been such simple thanks to CHIPS 3.0 manual point setting feature! You can just move the sliding block or the dolly to the starting point and then confirm it on APP! Gimbal keyframes also can be set manually,  gives you the ability of full control over the movement of DJI & ZHIYUN & Feiyu gimbal!Add a joint, attach together, mount a tripod, then CHIPS sliders can transform into a motorized dolly. CHIPS 3.0 Motorized Slider Dolly allows you to capture incredible footage by creating linear and curved movements on the flat space. Perfect for interviews and motion time-lapses in urban settings. Our slider dolly is so portable that you can even put it in your to-go storage bag!Linear MovementCurved MovementCompared to the traditional physical button, touch screen makes CHIPS 3.0 Motorized Slider more functional and attractive. You can easily set up a motion time-lapse on the module. Perfect for creators who want free control of the motion system. CHIPS 3.0 uses ""YC Onion"" APP which features a simple interface that enables you to program gimbals, CHIPS 3.0 and all your YC Onion devices. APP Integration gives you full control remotely and the ability to create keyframes easily. All devices perform precise movements as you programmed. No matter you are a professional team or one-man band, CHIPS 3.0 Motorized Slider Dolly allows you to create unique, imaginative contents impressing your audience as your wish, anytime, anyplace.Getting started with CHIPS 3.0 is super-fast and doesn’t require complicated setups. Perfect level pans every time. Featuring inverted design with panning turntable at the top so there's no need to level your tripod legs or Platypod.

column3:
>The Top Shelf Camera Bag is the first open-layout sling bag that lets you access all your gear in 1.1 seconds.

The patented sling design rests in a tabletop position on your hip so you can see all your gear and set up on a flat, clean surface. It’s like a table whenever and wherever you need it!

Securely carry your camera, lenses, laptop, keys, passport, tripod and more, all in one sleek bag!

This ultra-lightweight camera bag gives you immediate access to your gear so you never miss a shot no matter the situation. And the best part? You don’t even have to take the bag off!

Most camera bags require you to put down the bag (sometimes on the ground or dirty surfaces!) and unzip at least ¾ of the main compartment to access all your gear. With The Top Shelf, you get instant, full-view access to all your gear with zero digging for buried or hidden gear. 

In one swift motion and push of a button, the sling transforms into a large, viewable compartment where all your gear’s perfectly organized by velcro dividers with endless configurations.

Wear The Top Shelf your way with patented dual-strap technology that seamlessly shifts from backpack to sling without compromising style.

The versatile design combines the convenience and accessibility of a compact sling bag with the comfort and weight distribution of a backpack.

 

Our instant-access push-button never compromises the safety of your gear.

If you prefer a traditional backpack zipper, The Top Shelf has that, too! The full compartment zipper and Instant-Access Latch give you speed and accessibility without compromising safety and security.

The Top Shelf Camera Bag turns into a work table and laptop station instantly. When you swing the sling around to your side, it lands in a flat, tabletop position, ready for anything.

The organized compartments separate your gear for easy access, and the tabletop design gives you a safe, flat surface to assemble or change lenses.

The Top Shelf doesn’t compromise on quality one bit. With the classic black color, water-resistant nylon, rain cover, YKK zippers, comfortable padded straps, and heavy-weight capability in a soft-shell, you can trust this bag to withstand every adventure.

Whether you’re a full-time pro or hobbyist photographer, you need to keep your gear safe and  access it quickly. The Top Shelf Camera Bag is sturdy and convenient enough for professional use but stylish and versatile enough for everyday use.

The comfortability and compactness of The Top Shelf make it the essential everyday bag.

Laptop bag, camera bag, backpack—there’s no need for so many bags. The Top Shelf camera bag holds everything you need in a carry-on size with compartments for your gear, laptop, keys, phone and passport. It’s compact enough that you can use it if you’re going out with just a small camera, yet it’s big enough to hold up to 8 lenses and a full size DSLR camera!

Whether you’re working with 8 lenses or just one camera and a tripod, The Top Shelf Camera Bag never lets you miss a moment.

It’s the best camera storage solution available for photographers looking to maximize time, space, weight and comfort while having extreme usability in the field. Just wait until you try it!

Sincerely,

New to Indiegogo? No problem. Follow these simple steps to get your own Top Shelf Camera Bag.

At the end of the campaign, we’ll send you a survey to get your shipping information and deliver your Top Shelf Camera Bag when manufacturing is complete!

column7:
>Testimonials

Steve (Colorado, US): THANK YOU! I just got my Alpha S Mokacam and I love it! Works great with my iPad too. Its been a long time to wait but it was worth it. Thanks so much for keeping on top of everything.

Timothy (Kentucky, US): I’ve had mine (Alpha S) for a week and I love it. Hands down the best experience I have had with an action camera (I’ve used Gopro’s and several knockoffs).

wu kwok kai (Hong Kong): 香港區收到了(Alpha S)，真的很小，好玩

nicomeech (France): I was one that i bought the very first Mokacam and this product is amazing ! The moka camera is very good, so i trust in you and in your company. I support you again for this new project, because i was happy from the first one :)

kimvellore (California, US): I have been using the Mokacam and I love it. I am looking forward to this awesome new camera.

ticous78 (Paris, France):Thanks a lot for your awesome product ! Keep up the good work for your next camera!

Andrew M. Leslie (US): Customer support replied quickly (within 24 hours). The screen reliably flips with a press of the OK button. Once you get the hang of the buttons, you can reliably operate the camera without a screen. I can take great quality video and the 20MP photo quality is excellent!
column9: >Use Mokacam shooting long exposure night pics or even the stars! Comfortable and convenient operation with the shutter wheel and new designed buttons. In Manual mode, you can turn the shutter wheel to set the shutter speed freely from 1/2000"" up to 32"".

column1:
General
Technical
Payment and Shipping
Are you offering a warranty on Alpha?
Yes, we are offering a 1-year warranty. Warranty is only for exchange of a defective unit. No returns for refund.
Yes, we have several positions available. Check them out and apply here.
The price is very lower than GoPro Hero 5 Black, but the features are even better. Why is that?

Our dream is to make the innovation cameras accessible to everyone. We have worked long and hard to create cameras that are not only affordable, but also made of quality components. To help us bring Alpha to reality, you can get an exclusive 50% discount off MSRP.
We’ve fulfilled over all of the confirmed (survey answered) Mokacam4K orders. The rest are mostly new orders and orders returned due to unsuccessful delivery or custom reason.
What is the difference between Alpha and Alpha S?

Alpha S has an Ambarella image processor, which is the same vendor that GoPro works with. The video feature is 4K@30FPS and 1080P@120FPS, which is same to GoPro Hero 5 Black. Alpha applied the same image processor to Mokacam, the frame rate is similar to GoPro Hero4 and provides all the other features of Alpha-S.
What is the difference between 120FPS and 60FPS, what can I do with this feature?
Mokacam Alpha-S has an Ambrella image processor and provides 1080P120FPS video features
column2: it means you can get 1/5 speed Full-HD slow motion video.

column1: I have a back-up battery for Mokacam. Does it match Alpha?

No, the size of Alpha is 20% smaller than Mokacam but we still want the battery capacity keeps similar to Mokacam. So we made some changes on the design of the metal contact on the camera, and the former back-up battery won’t match Alpha.
Does Alpha S have Normal Angle Mode?
Yes, and the Alpha S has features like 4K 2K or 1440P for 16:9/4:3/SuperView Mode, so you can expect almost all the video features of GoPro Hero 5 Black.
Yes, you can change the settings in the screen module
What's the video recording duration for 1080P 60FPS and 64 Gig of memory?
At 60FPS, 64 Gigs will record 6 hours of footage. At 30FPS, 64 Gigs will record 12 hours.
Can you stream live video using Mokacam?
Yes, you can stream live vide using the application. We’ll also work on the Facebook Live support
column2: we may finish it before the shipping.

column1: Yes, there is an Android and iOS APP. The APPs are ready for operation and will be released before the shipping.
How do you know how much power is left in the batteries?
You can see the battery status on the screen, or in the App.
How do you know how much memory is remaining?
You can see the remaining storage status on the screen, or in the App.
Does Alpha come with a memory card?
No, we are not including a memory card with your order.
Will a charging cable come with Moka360?
Yes, each package will include a Micro USB for charging.
What are the ratings for the waterproof case?
135 feet/40 meters with waterproof case, could work with or without the back battery.
How many hours will Alpha last if only used for taking pictures?
There are many factors and conditions to calculate this, but generally the battery life should last you for more than 1 day.
Can Alpha connect to a microphone through a 3.5mm mic adapter?
Alpha does not have a 3.5mm port, but it could work with the Micro USB adapter to work with a microphone.
Yes, Alpha has been tested to work at -20C degrees.
Is Alpha compatible with a standard tripod?
Yes, the base of Alpha includes a standard 1/4 inch screw slot.
How long will it take to completely charge the internal camera battery?
This depends on the type of charger you are using, but generally it will take 2 hours.
What is the Battery Life (estimated time) of Alpha?

Video recording is estimated at 1h 30m. The rotatable screen module can double the battery life and the spare battery that simply snap on magnetically can extend your battery life to 4 hours for video filming.
Is the focus automatic? Or is that done also through the screen?
The Alpha should not be charged on 100-220 volt, it should be charged by a Micro-USB cable, which means it depends on the USB adapter in your region.
Is it possible to use a Bluetooth remote?
In addition to WiFi, Alpha provides Bluetooth connection, which is more stable and consumes less power. So we will provide a Bluetooth remote to control Alpha wirelessly.
Can Alpha be controlled with a 1st generation Mokacam's remote controller?
Alpha use Bluetooth connection for remote, but Mokacam use 2.4G for remote. So Alpha can only be controlled with the wireless Alpha remote controller.
How confident are you that you can deliver on time?
This is the 3rd campaign of Team Mokacam
column2: we have built closer relationships with our manufacturing partners and the fulfillment vendors. The prototype of Alpha was ready months ago and extensive testing has already been performed. The molds for Alpha are much simpler compared with 1st generation Mokacam, which was designed to be SplashProof, so the molds are super complicated and caused the delay. We are confident in our ability to meet the timeline. Although unforeseen obstacles can arise during any manufacturing process, we intend to run everything efficiently, transparently.

column1: We ship worldwide and the cost is $15.
Can I pick the camera up in Mokacam office and avoid the shipping charge?
Sorry, we'd love to meet you, but the cameras are shipped from our manufacturing partners by air. We have to pay shipping on every camera.
The estimated shipping date is May 2017.
Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

column2: please check your country's import duties before purchasing. It should be 0% in the US and varies internationally. You can check this comprehensive list to get started.

column1: Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here.

Risks and Challenges

While we're doing a lot of the work ourselves, obviously we have to rely on others (manufacture, shipping) to provide their end. We're confident that these parts will be no problem, as we’ve been working with these companies and vendors for 1 year, our experience on Mokacam and Moka360 will also help us on planning the manufacture procedure. But there still could be something that comes up, be it components supply, shipping, the manufacturing line schedule or any other of the many things that can delay the process. We will do our best, and hope to deliver on time, and whatever happens we will keep you updated every step along the way.

We will definitely deliver a great product, and hope to do so on time!

Thanks from the whole team  :)

 
Legal Disclaimer

""Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.
