This effect brings the true color of the underwater world to life, as it offers 800 Lumens of intense light. Built-In Dive ComputerDive computers are a key piece of safety equipment for all divers. They help prevent accidents by measuring depth, dive duration, and ascending speed. The HotDive Pro, the advanced version of the HotDive, uses a built-in computer that acts as an all-in-one solution.HotDive Pro’s computer uses a Nordic Semiconductor ultra-low power consumption (ULP) wireless chip for fast processing speed and in-depth monitoring. Its high capability is made better with low power consumption and a stronger signal to ensure a smooth connection to your smartphone. HotDive Pro also uses a Swiss TE MS5083 depth sensor to monitor real-time depth, calculate ascent speed, and issue warnings. And it also has a built-in compass, so you always know which direction you’re diving in. Smart Tech Keeps You SafeThanks to an advanced dive computer, HotDive Pro is made with your safety in mind. It calculates depth and time spent diving so it can inform you when the safety stop required.When it detects that the depth stress has reached 5 meters it will sound an alarm by vibrating to remind you to stay underwater for 3 minutes before ascending to the surface.

Taking photos with HotDive is simple and easy. Using professional software designed for underwater environments, HotDive lets you take photos or videos, switch between the front and rear cameras with the press of one button.You can even preview your photos and videos with just 1 click! Scuba Diving Modes & Freediving Mode The HotDive App works with the HotDive Pro and can be set to two modes: scuba diving and freediving. These modes are only available on the HotDive Pro due to its built-in dive computer. Scuba diving mode is able to show real-time depth, maximum depth,  current temperature, and current diving time. It also allows you to set a maximum depth vibration reminder, maximum diving time vibration reminder, and vibration reminder when the ascent speed is too fast. This function is very helpful for both first-time divers and professional divers.Freediving mode can set 5 different depth vibration and surface time vibration reminders.Thanks to the exclusive sturdy design, you can use HotDive for both snorkeling(0-10m) and freediving(10m-80m). The real-time depth and dive time displayed on the screen allows you to take photos & videos while knowing how deep you are and how long your current dive time is. Thanks to the built-in 800 lumens fill light HotDive allows you to do a quick snorkeling night dive near your beach resort before sleeping. Isn't it nice to post some octopus photos and wake up with a lot of likes on your social media channel?What People Are Saying About HotDive
Filmed footage by iPhone 12 with the HotDive Pro

HotDive’s app lets you log your dives automatically by connecting to your phone and auto-syncing your photos and videos. It lets you view real-time results and even share your diving status at any time! The photos & videos are actually stored in your smartphone instead of the HotDive. This can save you a lot of time to enjoy your dives.
3500ma Battery That Lasts Your Entire Dive

HotDive powers your dives with a powerful battery. It offers you 15-20 days of power without using the fill light and 100 minutes of continuous power while using the fill light. You don't need to bother charging it all the time!HotDive Works With Your Favorite DevicesHotDive is compatible with every iPhone and Android phone – as long as the size is smaller than 168mm(6.6inch) x 84mm(3.3inch)(exclude the smartphones with pop-up camera ) and has Bluetooth. (HotDive controls your phone via iPhone or Android apps) Even if you change your phone regularly, HotDive will always be a good buddy with your new phones. This will save you tremendous money and hassle. If you are unable to use the HotDive app on your smartphone (or if it’s incompatible) please email us and our team will assist you and we will update the app. Wrist Strap For Easy UseBuilt with a handy wrist strap, HotDive is always close at hand without interfering with your diving. It also lets you use your hands when you’re not taking photos or shining the fill light! Made To Withstand The DepthsHotDive is made from one whole piece of aluminum alloy that is precisely cut by CNC machines. It is made to withstand the pressures of the depths and keep your smartphone safe. The exclusive mechanical design of HotDive guarantees the full seal of the case once the vacuum is completed which makes it impossible to leak while diving. The compact of the material and the inner vacuum contribute it to be waterproof for a depth of up to 80 meters. That's more than enough for recreational scuba diving and freediving. So, you should feel safe to put your smartphone inside the HotDive case and start recording your adventures. Make It Your Own with LensesHotDive is made to adapt to your needs. That’s why we made it work with lenses you can pick up at your local camera store or online. If you want a macro lens or a wide lens, you can pick it up and attach it to the HotDive discovering more possibilities for photography.An App Does The Work For You The HotDive app lets you use all its functions offline. Meaning you can review your photos instantly with no internet connection! Tech Specs What You’ll Get​ Operation Demonstration

HotDive Production Process ​Meet The People Behind HotDiveYiwu Bubble Network Technology Co., Ltd. was established in May 2015. We specialize in producing marine diving equipment. Our team came together because of our love of diving. We travel around the world every year to dive together in new dive sites. This brought us to create HotDive, the professional smart diving all-in-one smart diving kit. We have always worked to create quality and innovative equipment to enhance the diving experience. And we will continue to carry out technological innovations for HotDive in the hope that HotDive will be a part of your next diving trip and will help you reach new depths.You can find all the information you need about HotDive in our media kit below. If you have specific questions please don’t hesitate to reach out to us at team@hotdive.cn",31.0,7,"1 Campaign

Snooperscope™ is a special portable and wireless device that, by using your mobile device as a screen, enables you to see in low light conditions and in total darkness.

Plus, under visible light, it reveals hidden things that normally cannot be seen by the human eye.

By employing special optics, the user can see in the area covered by the light even though the naked eye only detects total darkness.

A number of more practical applications have been developed with the Snooperscope because of its ability to peer through any opaque material that infrared rays can pass through.
column2: >In this video all the features of the Snooperscope:
column3:
>
 

 

 

Snooperscope in action in complete darkness - The House:
column8:
schema=vimeo"" width=""580"">

Snooperscope and the Kinect Effect:
column18:
schema=vimeo"" width=""580"">

 

 

 

Snooperscope is available in 4 colors:

     

     

     

    Snooperscope has standard threads for installation on tripods, car mounts and universal stands

     

     

     

     

    Snooperscope can be can be attached to any smartphone or tablet with a special magnet

     



    Snooperscope is primarily a Night Vision device and whether by biological or technological means, night vision is made possible by a combination of two approaches: sufficient spectral range, and sufficient intensity range. Humans have poor night vision compared to many animals, in part because the human eye lacks a tapetum lucidum.Spectrum of visible and invisible light.

     

    Human vision is confined to a small portion of the electromagnetic spectrum called visible light. 

    Snooperscope enables the user to see objects in the dark by illuminating the object with infrared radiation at 940nm and converting the reflected radiation into a visual image.
    The resulting scene, which is apparently dark to a human observer, appears as a visible image to the Snooperscope, and this image and video are sent wirelessly to your smartphone or tablet.

     

    Snooperscope is perfect for professional and personal applications, like:
column19:
/>

 

Snooperscope has virtually unlimited applications in experimental projects.

Here are some applications you can use with your Snooperscope:

 

The Snooperscope Apps are available for both iOS and Android.

The App is really easy to setup and use:

column1: • download it free from the App Store or Google Play
• pair Snooperscope with a direct Wi-Fi connection to your smartphone or tablet (no router needed)
• open the App and you are done!

column5:
> what you're seeing on your smartphone? 

Simply click the snapshot icon on the App to take still pictures or click the record icon to record an actual video and save it. 
The snapshots will come up so it's easy to save them as a JPEG in your smartphone. 
The recorded video will automatically save as an MPEG.

 

To connect with your smartphone or tablet you don't need any internet connection or router, Snooperscope uses a Wi-Fi direct connection AP mode or connect anywhere and everywhere with your internet connection CLOUD mode
All this with ZERO Configuration!

 

 

Snooperscope runs through a Wi-Fi peer-to-peer connection, meaning it's protected with a secure video feed.

Snooperscope uses H.264 video compression. This is a standard for video compression that allows for a better frame rate and smoother, enhanced, top quality video from the camera sensor.

Snooperscope has its own on-board power battery that provides up to 4 hours of active use. That means you don’t have to limit where you go or what you do because of a cord tethering you to one place – and it also won’t drain the battery in your mobile device.
column6:
/>

Snooperscope packaging and shipping process:
column7:
/>

 

Can I use Snooperscope in the day light, too?

Yes, Snooperscope under visible light reveals hidden things that normally cannot be seen by the human eye. It uses a camera and a len specially designed for working in low light condition, and in the some day light conditions the images could be different in color.

 

Can I mount Snooperscope on a tripod, wall, ceiling, helmet, etc.?

For sure. You can mount the Snooperscope anywhere that you can place a standard ¼” 20 thread tripod mount. Including utilizing GoPro mounts. And it has a double magnet to mount on all metallic surfaces.

 

Does the Snooperscope work with any smartphone?

We have built applications for both iOS and Android devices that will allow you to wirelessly connect to your Snooperscope to record, view and share photos and video right from within the App.

 

Do I need an internet connection or a router?

Absolutely no, you don't need any internet connection or router. Snooperscope uses a Wi-Fi direct connection (peer-to-peer) with your smartphone. Wi-Fi direct is an emerging wireless standard that allows you to create a connection between any two devices without going through a wireless router. With a Wi-Fi direct you can connect the Snooperscope and your smartphone anywhere and everywhere. No hubs, no trunks or centralized repository of data and connectivity.

 

Does Snooperscope work with tinyCam App for Android?

Absolutely yes, you can use Snooperscope with tinyCam Monitor for Android, both FREE and PRO versions, starting from version 5.8 (December 2014), in the manufacturer list you can find ""Snooperscope"", choose model V1.
Snooperscope is ONVIF compatible.
You can download tinyCam Monitor for Android here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...

 

 

 

in the movement to take Snooperscope to the next level!

At last, shake-free 3D content creation that's easy and affordable for EVERYONE!  Weeview's SID offers the BEST immersive and stereoscopic viewing experience. Don’t just record the special memories, start re-living the experience in unbelievable life-like 3D format.
column4:
>

There are regular 3D cameras and there is SID. With our best stereoscopic effect 3D recording, viewers can truly re-live and re-define the experience.

Stereoscopic 3D cameras are bulky for a reason, the physical limitation between the two lenses in mimicking the human eye. With our patented digital video calibration, SID brakes all the rules and has made the form factor so small it fits in the palm of your hand.

column1: You can also adjust the parallax setting of video in the App to get different stereoscopic effects.

The quality of the 3D video is amazing, just put on a VR goggle and see for yourself and become a true believer!

 (This video was shot with the Cinematic Kit: SID + Compatible Gimbal)

column47:

SID has gone through a rigorous development process. From the initial conceptual design to various prototype iterations, the goal is to offer the best cinematic video recording experience. And that’s why we have taken our effort on Kickstarter, where we need the crowdfunding community support in helping make SID for everyone.
column54:
>

Weeview was established in 2016. Weeview strives to design leading technology that’s ahead of the curve in 3D technology. With our talent marketing team and highly trained team of hardware and software engineers that specialize in computer vision, optical design, application development and 3D spatial visualization, we have the expertise and talent to bring the ultimate 3D experience to you.
column55:

Eye-Plug is world’s first plug-in 3D video camera module for mobile phone. Easily plug Eye-Plug into your smart phone and it can transform your smart phone into a 3D video camera. Moreover, with our depth technology you can take blurry background photos like DSLR does. You can shift the focus and apply the filters even after the photo is taken. Hello!
My faithful and constant companion is in need of a replacement. While it has served me well for many years, it is no longer able to keep up with me.

I am hoping for your help, and in return I would like to offer you a piece of Catie Tackitt Photography of your very own. For each level of donation, there is a different size or type of print that you will receive.
Please browse the gallery tab above, and select a photo. I will email you after you have donated, and get information for which photo you have chosen.
I hope you have enjoyed my photos over the last several years, and I hope to be able to provide you with more for years to come.
I've never offered my prints for sale, but now you have the opportunity to own one!
Photos can be chosen from the photos from the gallery tab above. If there is a photo of mine you desire, but it is not one of the ones show, please let me know.
• Matted Prints will need to be framed by the recipient.
• Gallery wrapped canvas are ready to be hung on the wall right out of the box.
• 5x7 non-matted prints are perfect for a desk or that small part of wall missing something.

• Matted Print sizing.
    5x7 print in 8x10 mat
    8x10 print in 11x14 mat.

Thanks for taking the time to look at my campaign.

column2:

LeveTop T1S is built on the basis of the 1st generation drone of LeveTop! It is foldable, portable, and smart. LeveTop T1S is an ideal choice for family entertainment or traveling. You can always trust him whenever you need to record or take a selfie.

column1: LeveTop is capable of detecting the movement and its direction with the principle of optical flow. It is also capable of operating in unknown and GPS-denied environments such as in houses, caves, tunnels or any other places where no accurate GPS signal is available, since it's not dependent on an external device or signal.
LeveTop T1S can be used in many scenes. Such as entertainment, extreme sports, commencement, and touring. You can always rely on T1S while shooting a qualified video or taking a photo.
column3:
>

 LeveTop's superior foldable design makes it convenient to carry. It can be taken everywhere and fits into your bag. No more hassle of carrying around a drone when you are not using it.
column4:
>

2x switchable cameras equipped! The main camera of LeveTop is equipped with SONY IMX179 1/3.2"" Sensor, 4G lens, it delivers smooth 1080P Full-HD video with stunning image quality.

The second camera is at the bottom of the drone, so you can get different angles with it. All these features ensure you the best filming experience.
column5:
>

Go for a run worry free while LeveTop Auto-Follows you. Simply download the App to your iOS or Android device, and control it at the click of a button. GPS tracking means it will stay with you no matter where you go.
column6:
>

The App control system removes the awkwardness of traditional piloting remote.
column8:
>

The battery life of LeveTop T1S is up to 20 minutes, which is longer than the average battery life of the drones in the market.

Brushless motors inside the drone:

Many portable drones use DC motors to lower the cost. DC motors have a short battery life (basically within ten minutes). The wind resistance is weak since the speed of drones powered by DC motor is low. But with LeveTop's brushless motors, the flying speed is the next level, so that the wind resistance is excellent. There is almost no limit to the service life (5,000 to 10,000 hours). 

DJI is undoubtedly the leader of the drone industry. However, the cost of a single product of DJI is quite high. LeveTop is more cost-effective compared with any other drone in the market, which makes it a perfect choice if you need a drone to record your precious moments.
column9:
>

The Levetop T1S is smaller and lighter than the first generation. What's more, T1S provides two cameras, including a 1080 Full-HD camera and the other one at the bottom of the drone. It will give you a brand new photography experience with the two cameras of different angles.
column15:
showinfo=0"">

 

The switchable cameras of LeveTop allow you to capture selfie shots from a unique perspective. Taking pictures and videos is easy for anyone with the programmed flight modes. Great for newbie pilots who want to focus on getting that perfect selfie rather than worry about positioning the drone.

The Wi-Fi connectivity allows you to share your photos and videos instantly.
column16:
> 

 We have designed an early warning indicator when there are less than 3 minutes of remaining battery life. LeveTop will return safely when the GPS connection is lost, as its onboard computer stores the GPS coordinates where it took off. What's more, experiments showed that the aircraft fell unharmed from a height of ten meters.
column18:
>

There are four propeller protectors equipped with LeveTop. The design reduces the probability of accidental injury by the drone. In the meanwhile, it's also a kind of protection for the drone itself.
column21:
>

The signal of remote control of T1 is 2.4G . There are two versions of T1S, 2.4G/5.8G. The transmission distance of the 2.4G version is around 100m. The 5.8G version has a more stable transmission and the transmission distance up to 500m. It's worth mentioning that the 5.8G version can even fly up to 300 meters.
column23:
>

For applications in urban environments where tall buildings may obstruct a portion of the sky, we recommend the solution that works with both GPS and GLONASS satellites.

If you rely on only one constellation, there may not be 4 satellites visible in such a small slice of the sky, making it difficult to get a position fixing. When you add a second constellation, you double your chances of getting a fixing in this environment.
column26:
>

There are eight parts in the box, including 1x T1S drone, 1x Battery, 4x Propeller Guard(1 set), 1x Propeller(Backup), 1x Charger, 1x USB Cable, 1x Carrying Case, and 1x Quick Start Guide.
column31: >
column32:
>

LeveTop was founded by a group of talented engineers and designers based in Shenzhen, China. Their mission is to create drones that are simple to use and affordable. By perfecting the combination of portability and function, we are proud to bring LeveTop into your life.
LeveTop's first drone was officially launched in November 2017 on Kickstarter, which successfully raised US$ 254,000 US dollars and got 2,201 backers worldwide. We've also got several patents in LeveTop T1S design, flight control, rotor system, and battery circuit. 

 

 

 

","LeveTop T1S is built on the basis of the 1st generation drone of LeveTop! It is foldable, portable, and smart. LeveTop T1S is an ideal choice for family entertainment or traveling. You can always trust him whenever you need to record or take a selfie.

column1: LeveTop is capable of detecting the movement and its direction with the principle of optical flow. It is also capable of operating in unknown and GPS-denied environments such as in houses, caves, tunnels or any other places where no accurate GPS signal is available, since it's not dependent on an external device or signal.

LeveTop T1S can be used in many scenes. Such as entertainment, extreme sports, commencement, and touring. You can always rely on T1S while shooting a qualified video or taking a photo.  LeveTop's superior foldable design makes it convenient to carry. It can be taken everywhere and fits into your bag. No more hassle of carrying around a drone when you are not using it. 2x switchable cameras equipped! The main camera of LeveTop is equipped with SONY IMX179 1/3.2"" Sensor, 4G lens, it delivers smooth 1080P Full-HD video with stunning image quality.The second camera is at the bottom of the drone, so you can get different angles with it. All these features ensure you the best filming experience. Go for a run worry free while LeveTop Auto-Follows you. A one-handed single twist unlocks and locks Steadify’s monopod elements to its desired length. The fork-shaped mount on top is designed to reliably accommodate any device, letting it pan and tilt in all desired directions. The effect is instantly tangible and a truly stunning experience. Further, Steadify will handle the weight of your device so you can hold it for hours without tiring. The comfortable baseplate completely absorbs the weight of your gear. This is good news for wildlife photographers and filmmakers, for bird watchers, and hunters.

Steadify also functions as a jib arm for smooth vertical and horizontal camera movements, a bonus usually found in more lavish equipment. For cameramen, this feature adds life and dynamic to footage that can make a scene stand out.

• PHOTOGRAPHY: stable support for cameras, essential with long lenses and in low light. Working well on any terrain. The effect: crisp images regardless of the circumstances. Applications: outdoors, documentaries, events from concerts to weddings, shots from ships and planes, and much more.

• FILMING: as above, additionally functioning as a jibarm for dynamic vertical and horizontal camera movements. The effect: professionally smooth, lively footage. (Please keep in mind that walking while filming will de-stabilize your images - Steadify is not a SteadiCam.)
• ACTION: keeping action cams, compact cams, and smartphone cams closely attached to the body.

• BIRD-WATCHING: comforting support for binoculars and scopes. The effect: absolutely clear and stable viewing, especially effective with long lenses and in low light. Weight is totally absorbed, offering endless viewing without fatigue. Do your arms feel relieved already reading this?
• HUNTING: reliable support for tireless and safe aiming.
• universal steel mount with thick rubber cushion
• lightweight and sturdy design of 0.5 kg (1 lb)
• optional pocket clip for spare batteries, memory cards, etc.
In its first incarnation, Steadify has been in the hands of numerous users in the outdoors. Here are some quotes picked from a variety of messages:
“I must say I was very impressed with the whole design and the sheer simplicity of the unit.” Jim Conlon, Ireland
“The Steadify has proven to be a great assistance, keeping my hands free and my actions flexible. I can highly recommend it.” Martin Kutz, Germany

“I really am stoked on this product. This is also great for when I am filming a model at the beach and on hikes cause I don't need to set anything in the sand or in a weird spot, I can keep everything elevated without hurting my back. REALLY REALLY excited!” Joe Vulpis, Los Angeles

“A great product! Without it, my arms would have tired quickly although I am in good physical shape. The Steadify way of stabilization is definitely superior to comparable methods.” Philip Klein, Germany
“I seen and tested your product and have to say very impressed indeed.” Leonard Rasmussen, Ireland
“I am thrilled with its easy handling.” Bernd Sippel, Germany
“You could stay and aim for hours if you had to.” Ron Spomer, USA
“The quality of manufacture is impressive.” Jens Ulrik, Denmark
“Out there, Steadify has proven extremely helpful in all kinds of situations.” Max Goetzfried, Germany
“Light, flexible, easy handling, good quality, takes little space. Ideal for me.” Phil Schiefke, Germany
“Steadify and the human body are forming a solid triangle of remarkable stability by maintaining full flexibility.” Der Anblick, Germany

Steadify is ready and set for large scale manufacturing. Production time is approximately 6 weeks, shipping will take another two weeks. All in all, delivery to final users can take place about two months after the closing of this campaign.

After the campaign closes, you'll receive a survey so you can customize your color selection and take a look at other ad-ons and options! Please note—shipping will be charged after the campaign. The cost of shipping is $10 for US orders and $25 for International shipping.
We can't wait to get Steadify in your hands and on your hips!

Creating Steadify was really a long shot and finally needed the skill of a high level expert such as Marcel Klamer, our award-winning, utterly thorough and painfully critical designer. Thank you, Marcel, so glad having you on board!
Manufacturing was a task on the shoulders of Irene and Arlen: thank you for your tireless efforts to meet the high demands of German pickiness.

And finally, the preparation and making of this campaign, with a team of creatives, assistants, models, and outdoor enthusiasts contributing wherever required: Thomas, Justin, Jaki and her team, Rainer, Sabine, Rebecca, Hans-Kristian, Christopher, Rangna, Glaceia, Arthur (for his patience), Mary, Chester, Franziska, Marcus, Benny, Yvy, Simon: we are grateful for your tremendous help to make Steadify shine regardless the circumstances (especially so in some rather rugged environments).

We are SHIPPING NOW!

Lensta production is finished, and we are now shipping all orders on our campaign. We are very grateful for all of our supportive backers who helped us through this awesome journey with Lensta.

 

Capture Memories with LenstaWide

Meet LenstaWide, the first professional smartphone camera lens with the greatest features you could ever ask for, lively colors, great angle, and high resolution
 


 

 

LenstaWide allows you to have broader width, bigger perspective, and more elements and people in your photos. Our goal is to never leave anyone or anything behind in your special moments.
 


                                                                  Without LenstaWide


                                                                      With LenstaWide

 



                          Without LenstaWide                                            With LenstaWide

LenstaWide is a professional camera lens made with the same materials used to build high quality professional cameras. To Know what photos will you get, look below

 
 Shot by @AnnaAmelia With LenstaWide

 


Shot by @AnnaAmelia with LenstaWide

 


Shot by @AnnaAmelia with LenstaWide

 


Shot by @AnnaAmelia With LenstaWide
 

 


 Shot by @AnnaAmelia with LenstaWide

 

 

LenstaWide intensifies color and light through its multiple glass layers to provide the richest possible colors and emulate life-like images.
 


Shot by @Jaanek with LenstaWide

 


Shot by @Jaanek with LenstaWide

 


Shot by @HassanNaser with LenstaWide
 

 


 

The technical team behind LenstaWide comes from a varied range of expertise. Professional photographers came together with industrial and product designers and engineers to come up with the best smartphone camera lens to be ever made

 


 




Our designers have studied what makes professional camera lenses special, and used similar materials and components as those used in professional lenses.

 

LenstaWide is compatible with all phone types and can be easily mounted on any of them. Whatever phone you use, make sure that LenstaWide will help make your camera a professional one.

 

We have been working hard for over a year to make the perfect smartphone camera lens. And now, LenstaWide is ready to ship. Our manufacturers and suppliers are lined up and ready to start producing your LenstaWide, and have them delivered to your doorsteps before the end of this year.

Production and Shipping (Latest Photos and Updates)

LenstaWide Lens is now ready to ship. While we are still coordinating with our fulfillment agency for pick-packing, labeling and providing tracking numbers, here are a series of photos that illustrate our production, tooling, inspection and shipping process.

1- LenstaWide Angle Lens production facility in Shenzhen, China

 

2- LenstaWide Team in Shenzhen inspecting the lenses glass prior to assembly

 

3- Final assembly and inspection

 

4- LenstaWide lenses fully produced (1500 units)

 

5- More than 90% of our backers asked for a universal clip to be included in LenstaWide package, to be able to use LenstaWide with any device. We are now providing universal clips for all backers.

 

6- This is the full amount of LenstaWide protective pouch bags which will be offered  with every LenstaWideorder

 

7- The final thing: This is what you will be receiving (the full LenstaWide lens box from the inside, with LenstaWide lens, a universal clip, protective pouch bag, and protective lens cap)

 

8- LenstaWide Lens package (front view)

 

9- LenstaWide lens package (back view)

 

10- Final LenstaWide packing and pick-pack for shipping

 

11- LenstaWide units before they are set to sail to your front doors :)

 

FAQs

- Are these photos real?

Yes, we gave normal smartphone users some LenstaWide prototypes and asked them to try it in their daily life. they sent us these awesome photos. Some of them have iPhones while others used LenstaWide on their Samsung phones

 

- Is LenstaWide compatible with my phone?

Yes, LenstaWide can be mounted on any phone or tablet.

 

- Why did LenstaWide choose a flexible campaign funding plan?

Flexible campaigns allow for a more payment choices by backers. We wanted everyone to be able to buy LenstaWide. Whether you want to use PayPal, ApplePay or your credit card, you can get your LenstaWide from here.

- How do I add my shipping address to my order?

Adding the shipping address will be required from you before you continue to place the order. If you wanted to change the shipping address later, you can reach out to us directly and we will arrange for it to be changed.

column6: >Hello, My name is Walter Colby Lake, I mainly go by Colby though. I am an aspiring photographer attending Ringling College of Art and Design in beautiful Sarasota, Florida. I am an independent student, meaning I am paying for school myself, which isn't very easy considering the tuition is $44,000 a year. Not too long ago tragedy struck when my car was broken into. The thief not only took my cameras but all the equipment for them as well. That event left me devastated and hurt. Photography is my life, all my friends could tell you that wherever I am my cameras are as well.This whole ordeal has been very rough for me, so the sooner its fixed the better.
column7: font-family: 'lucida grande', tahoma, verdana, arial, sans-serif
column11: >In order for me to participate in my next semester of school (which is THE most important to me) I would need a camera and some equipment. I only have a month and a half of summer break left and now I not only have to worry about getting a car, but also purchasing some new cameras and equipment. I am asking for your help to gain some of the funds necessary to purchase a new camera so that I can continue to produce work for my classes. Here is the link to my flickr account and my blog so you can see what I do.

column7: >I am truly desperate, any contribution no matter big or small will help greatly. My goal may seem a little steep or unrealistic but equipment is expensive, so even if I don't make my goal, your donations will be greatly appreciated and will go a long way. All proceeds will be invested in camera equipment ONLY. You may be asking yourself what you get other than the rewarding feeling of helping someone in need. As a thank you for your donation, I would love to send you a print of any one of my photos or a one of a kind artist card made by me.

column1: You can help by spreading the word about this to your friends or whoever! The more the merrier!

Hello, My name is Walter Colby Lake, I mainly go by Colby though. I am an aspiring photographer attending Ringling College of Art and Design in beautiful Sarasota, Florida. I am an independent student, meaning I am paying for school myself, which isn't very easy considering the tuition is $44,000 a year. Not too long ago tragedy struck when my car was broken into. The thief not only took my cameras but all the equipment for them as well. That event left me devastated and hurt. Photography is my life, all my friends could tell you that wherever I am my cameras are as well.This whole ordeal has been very rough for me, so the sooner its fixed the better. In order for me to participate in my next semester of school (which is THE most important to me) I would need a camera and some equipment. I only have a month and a half of summer break left and now I not only have to worry about getting a car, but also purchasing some new cameras and equipment. I am asking for your help to gain some of the funds necessary to purchase a new camera so that I can continue to produce work for my classes. Here is the link to my flickr account and my blog so you can see what I do.
What Your Contribution Will Do For Me & What I Can Do For You

I am truly desperate, any contribution no matter big or small will help greatly. My goal may seem a little steep or unrealistic but equipment is expensive, so even if I don't make my goal, your donations will be greatly appreciated and will go a long way. All proceeds will be invested in camera equipment ONLY. You may be asking yourself what you get other than the rewarding feeling of helping someone in need. As a thank you for your donation, I would love to send you a print of any one of my photos or a one of a kind artist card made by me.
You can help by spreading the word about this to your friends or whoever! The more the merrier!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign
I am a passionate and aspiring photographer. I discovered photographer during
medical school while studying for my board exam. I was using my left-brain too
much for logic, and my right-brain for creativity was screaming to come out.
Although my doctoral career did not pan out, I realized that I am very good at
photography and have an eye for it. I started out shooting for my newborn baby
niece. Then I went on to shoot for events for nonprofits and startup companies.
Then my friends from church used me for their weddings. Nowadays, complete
strangers contact me to shoot their weddings!
I have a wedding to shoot in October.
This wedding is special because it is the first wedding from a complete
stranger who contacted me from my website. This soon to be bride was referred
to me from a videographer that I have worked with and from a friend that she
was a bridesmaid to. I feel honored to be referred and to be contacted like
this, and so I want to do the best job I can possibly do. I will go all out and
work 12 hours that day and think about creative ways to make her wedding
special. Because she trusts me, I want to deliver a good product to build a
lasting relationship. My current camera has limitations and I have outgrown it.
To make her wedding as memorable as I can, it starts with a one step upgrade to
camera I have been using is the Nikon D5000. However, it is not a professional
level camera. Some potential clients turned me down because of my camera. I
wish to take one step up from my current camera and upgrade to the Nikon D7100,
which is $1100 on Amazon. If I reach $800, I can buy a used one on Ebay. I believe this camera has the full functions I need
and the appearance for clients to respect me. Although my work speaks for
itself, I believe a better camera can take my passion to a whole new level.
If you donate, I would forever be in
your debt. A new camera might exercise my right-brain even more. It might pave
a way to more clients and more adventures. A perk for you would be a free photo
session of your choice. Whether it is an engagement, wedding, family, or event
session, I will gladly do a one-day shoot for you for free.
Sometimes, work does not feel like work
when you’re doing something you love. I can shoot all day without feeling tired
at all, as my clients can attest to. Oftentimes, I shoot until they are tired,
but the result is something they are pleased with. I cannot afford this camera
right now because I am paying back medical student loans, but this passion
might help me pay back loans sooner.
In all honesty, I am thankful that you
have read this far my story. I wish to develop this passion but the fact that
you’ve read this far is very much appreciated. Any amount would be helpful but
feel free to share my story and visit my webpage at www.duyphotography.com.

I love to take photos of dogs in action. They can be our own, or those we meet while out at the dog beach or other favorite places. One day while we were out, I offered to email some pics to two ladies we met out with their dogs. The feedback was very positive, and when we met out walking again one lady mentioned that she would like to get prints of some of the pics I'd taken. Unfortunately, these type of action shots often have to be zoomed from a distance and the camera I have doesn't have a high enough resolution for printing of a decent size.

Recently I've been laid of from work and am looking to make a change in direction for my career. The career is not photography but actually alternative health, and I would need some other source of income to help me during training and starting up a business. What better than something I absolutely enjoy!!
To this end, I'm asking for a small contribution in support of this goal to kick start a new life purpose.
The ability to take high resolution photos will benefit not only my family, but provide enjoyment for others for years to come.

For dog owners there is very little more uplifting than watching their dogs have fun off leash... with the wind in their fur and their paws splashing in puddles. However, capturing these moments can be trickier than you might think and I seem to have developed a knack for it.
Besides being a joy for me to do, it's also of value to others in that they can keep those treasured moments of their pets lives for ever.

I'm looking to purchase a camera like the one shown below. My current equipment is not a digital SLR and doesn't provide the fine detail required for printing (even though the results look fine on the screen). Also I'd like to purchase a tripod and some other small accessories (e.g. filters).

If you are kind enough to help me reach my goal, then I will give you a mention on my website (unless you wish to remain anonymous). If you contribute $20 then I will provide you with a 8""x10"" print from a high resolution photo in my collection if my goal is reached. For a contribution of $100 take photos of your own dog in action and you can choose three prints from the session (or choose three prints from the collection).
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18MP DSLR Camera With 18-55mm IS and 55-250mm IS Lens Kit
Please Share with any of Your Friends who may be Interested
Many thanks in advance for sharing this with your friends!
Please use the sharing buttons provided to share on Facebook and Twitter.

I am an 18 year old amateur photographer who is in need of funds to get camera lenses and to improve my photography. Many times I get frustrated when out doing photography as I am limited by just having my kit lens with my Nikon D3100.
Macro photography is my favourite kind of photography and it would be amazing to get a macro lens and do what I love.
I also am in love with nature photography and would love to take animal pictures with a telephoto lens. As well as this I would love to use a wide lens and try new techniques.
The Nikon macro lens is roughly £200, and the Nikon telephoto lens is roughly £400.
However, if I can't reach my goal I will use the funds towards other photography equipment such as different lens filters and photo editing software.

column2: >If you can't contribute but still want to help, please spread the word about this campaign!
>If I reach my goal, you will be able to see the photography taken with said lenses at http://lady---vengeance.deviantart.com/gallery/
>The link above also shows all the other photography that I have done in case anyone is interested.

column3: >Thank you very much to those who are willing to help. It is truly appreciated :)

Hi, my name is Mauseia Mc Taggart a semi-retired grandmother from Scarborough, Ontario, Canada where I run my small business doing bookkeeping, income tax preparation and little graphic designs.

For the past 13 years I have been shooting photos of the changes in the landscape during spring/summer and winter. During the Ice Storm in 2013 I did what I would naturally do and took some shots of the landscape under ice cover.

I was sharing my picks with a friend who is always encouraging me to sell my photos and he suggested I make a calendar with some of my photos.  The idea did not take much prodding as I love graphic designing. So I went through my ice photos and came up with the best ones and started designing a calendar.
Another friend told me about INDIEGOGO and how I could get the funds needed to make my dream a reality.
This project is important to me as it will help to establish me in the graphic design community and give my grandchildren a token of my accomplishment.
The project is a 14 month 2015 calendar featuring the photos from the ice storm. Some with photos of the same objects during the other seasons.
Along with the photos there will be little stories about where it was taken and the person who took them if I use photos taken by others.
With successful funding the calendar will be distributed from November 24,  to December 8, 2014.  My goal is to print and distribute 5,000 calendars.
With a great project idea and the material to get it under way I did my homework:
*  I checked the crowd-funding platform and realized it might just work for my                 very imaginative project.

*  Ask friends, family and acquaintances to contribute by submitting their ice                    storm photos which they will get credit for and support the crowd-funding                    campaign by backing it and spreading the news.
*  I checked the cost of printing for a project this size and found a great printing              company lined up with a favorably price.
*  I checked the price of packaging material and mailing costs.
*  I then worked out the cost of everything from beginning to end and worked out          the best rewards for the backers.
Here are 4 sample pages of what to expect in the calendar hope you enjoy them.
And idea of the front and back cover

Every great project requires funding and am turning to you to assist me in funding my project.  I have worked out very reasonable packages for my backers and give my personal guarantee that you will receive your rewards and you will not be disappointed in backing this project.
Become a backer.  Check out the packages chose the one that fits you sign up and we are on our way.
Share the news with friends and family encourage them to support the project and get the rewards.
By doing so you will assist in sharing a great calendar with our community if we reach our goal these beautiful calendars will be on their way to a minimum of 5,000 happy recipients.
What We Need & What You Get

To achieve my goal I requires C$5,000.00. 80% of which will go to printing the balance to packaging and postage.  I am devoting my time free of cost as the end result are more valuable to me than cash.

As a backer you will be able to share this unique calendar with your friends and family as your reward will be copies of the calendar and your name in the thank you section in the calendar where everyone receiving the calendar will be able to recognize your generosity!
If I do not achieve my $5,000.00 goal all funds received will go to printing the quantity of calendars it can and all backers will get their rewards.

The Impact I realize that there are a lot of calendars out there which might cost less than backing this one but this is not just a calendar to me it is a piece of Toronto weather history that can be passed on as a keepsake to your grandchildren as I  will be doing for mine.

I also realize that you do not know me and has no reason to trust me but there is a first time for everyone and everything and this is my first Indiegogo project and experience and I promise to go through projects and fund wherever I can not just looking for help willing to give back to the community.
I look forward to growing with the Indiegogo family with my future projects.
Risks & Challenges  The biggest risk to this project is delays!! Graphic design if I get sick and unable to complete it so I have enlisted back up just in case I need them.
Printing if I do not get it there on time for the deadline, again back up help to ensure it gets there on time.
The printer! I have chosen a experienced qualified printing company to do the job and they have given me a written guarantee if it get there on time they deliver it on time.

I realize that not everyone can financially support my project but to me it is the thought that counts so if you are one of those please support my project by passing the word around to your social media friends and relatives.
Thanks in advance for all your support.

Who is ""TRU""?
I ::am Tru Ferguson( AKA Trudi)
I::am a Toronto based photographer focused on fine Arts, fashion and contemporary portraiture. I have worked extensively in the Fashion/Beauty and Advertising world.
Having contributed to the fashion industry on multiple levels and facets of creativity for a number of years and being a lifelong artist, photography has garnered the most natural and gradual progression . Being immersed in the editorial world as a model and living throughout Europe and the U.S has provided me with an acute eye and style indicative of these varied cultural experiences which I aim to demonstrate in my work. I truly enjoy being an image maker and capturing a person at their finest. Helping them see themselves like they never have before.

 My vision is to continue my fine art series of Nudes and Art Portraits through a Solo exhibition at 185 Augusta in July 2013. This series is a branch off “The Manipulation"" :: of Light (and the absence of light in some cases). How I use light to only highlight the areas I want to show mirror a lot of what is happening in society... our obsession with controlling the beauty of the face and body and how they are perceived. Each image is by nature hard to repeat and is unique ... you never know what you will see.

To bring it to a new level, I need to update my camera equipment. This will also help me service my client on the portraiture side of my business. I am balancing the building up of my fine art work and the beginning of a successful portrait business. Unfortunately, my camera equipment is quite out of date and the Battery chamber has recentely broken and is being discreetly held with black duct tape (scary to even say it out loud) while I am getting more clients who need both photography and video. With ever-changing technology, you have to progress accordingly in your field and evolve where it's needed. My present camera does not do video.

As a Single Mother and an independent business owner, staying connected with clients’ needs is a major challenge… it is hard to have a vision of the next level and be constricted by material! I have had my present camera for quite some time, pushing to consistently and creatively do the best I can with what I have. But when there is a opportunity to make steps in your future “you take it”.
Part of this process is to show my little one that you fight for your dreams... no matter how many delays life brings... no matter what, you get creative in the ways you pursue your goals! Wherever she can be a part of the process I include her... she is my biggest cheerleader! :)
By contributing today (just below), you become an integral part of my artistic journey. My photography is my passion and my life.
I invite you to see my work at www.truferguson.com and please join my Fan page:: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Tru-Ferguson-Pho...

There are videos that show snippets of behind the scenes moments on my shoots and give you a great idea of my artistic journey. Thank goodness for tiny Flip recorder.

The Dollars and Sense:
 July Exhibition Cost (partial):

*Printing images: $1050
* Frames: $593.25
*Beverages for day of Show: $300
*1000 postcards/posters: $119
* Model fee: $400
*perks fulfillment: $125
*Indiegogo fees 9%: $531.54
*The Nikon D800 (including taxes). : $3389
(This will help me create significantly higher quality of still images for my fine art work and portraiture clients including video )
*Battery grip (including tax): $484.77
*HardDrive 1TB (including tax): $101.68
No matter where I get in reaching my goal here, there will be frequent updates here and on my Fan page as the budget is received! Whatever the final amount, with your help and my commitment, ""this Vision will be fulfilled""

(You DO NOT need a PayPal account to use Paypal. Major credit cards are accepted as well. it is going to look like you do need an account but you don't!! )

Wait a min ::There is always another way to HELP!
Whether you donate or you aren't able to at this time, please share this campaign with as many of your friends and family as you can! I am counting on you to help me connect with as many people as possible! Use the Indiegogo share buttons to get the word out about my campaign. You never know who you have in your network that would love to be a part of an art project...to add Art patron to their title.
If you are a local business in Toronto, please contact me to discuss offering Gift Vouchers to your best clients to show your appreciation. This enhances your business as well as mine. I would be happy to discuss details with you upon contact.
Click the share buttons below now it only take a few mins... No seriously! :)

Thanks in advance to my future ART PATRONS because I trust if you are here…then you are seeing this for a reason!

column2: >Do you want take unique photos?
column3: > Are you a beginner or professional photographer?
column4: >Lighting is the most overlooked aspect of photography for beginner photographers, but professional photographers are obsessed with it. The right type of lighting can help you make the best shoot.
column5: > We offer -  Multi-function, durable, and easy to use independent lighting source. The light that every photo enthusiast can afford.
column8: >Press about us
column11:
> 

UniColor lighting is based on high-brightness smart RGBW Led's. With the color temperature of pleasant 5000k neutral white with a color fidelity of CRI 91. These natural colors are reproduced much better when shooting, which is very important for portrait shots and skin tones.  Showing no flicker in any brightness level.
column12: >You have access to unlimited color possibilities - choose the best lighting for a photo.
column14:
>Hybrid Controller

 

The new Hybrid Controller system is a combination of the regular Remote Controller and your smartphone. The connection is established via general Wi-Fi module (up to 10 UniColors may be connected simultaneously).
column16:
>Our remote controlling system is so simple even kids can handle it!

column36:
>UniColor case made from the eco-friendly Acrylic glass tube.

We tested our case for half a year. It fell down again and again. Immersed in salt water for weeks. It stands against hot temperatures up to 185C degree.
column37:
>Choose your size

 

UniColor comes in two different form factors: UniColor Pro and UniColor. UniColor is the lighter and more compact of the two, weighing just 0.45kg and measuring 550x29mm versus the Pro’s 0.65kg and 1050x29mm. However, the UniColor Pro more than makes up for this with it’s incredible 1,800LM brightness (versus 900LM) and it’s 96 individual ‘pixels’ (versus 48). Both provide full RGBW(5000K) color.

Both of them were created together and comply with standards of manufacture quality. Two versions were tested, upgraded and tested again for achieving reliable operation.
column38:

Standard accessory kit includes: flexible legs tripod, double-sided screw, horizontal holder, carabine hook, bayonet, phone holder, strap.

column55:
>Imagination

 

As simple as it can be. We spent the time to design UniColor having only the most important components to make it as simple as it can be. For you, it’s a magic stick. A little bit imagination and magic and you can create amazing things with UniColor.

 

Unique umbrella in best traditions of “Blade Runner 2022” (future is here but still without replicants).

With the lighting handle in your umbrella, you will never be sad under the rain. And your pictures will have enough light.

 

Stage microphone holder. 

In small stage or blues bar, just replace old mic holder to Unicolor Pro and get better appearance of the performance.

 

Take UniColor with you on a camping trip. Durable, waterproof, 8h battery light. With USB charging, you can easily connect it to a small solar panel (5V).

The light that every photo enthusiast can afford.  Press about us UniColor effect UniColor lighting is based on high-brightness smart RGBW Led's. With the color temperature of pleasant 5000k neutral white with a color fidelity of CRI 91. These natural colors are reproduced much better when shooting, which is very important for portrait shots and skin tones.  Showing no flicker in any brightness level. You have access to unlimited color possibilities - choose the best lighting for a photo.   Hybrid Controller The new Hybrid Controller system is a combination of the regular Remote Controller and your smartphone.
